If we go to where there are more monsters, we might be able to catch up to the goblins who attacked your village.=如果我们去的地方有更多的怪物，我们也许能赶上袭击你们村庄的哥布林。
I want to save Miria as soon as possible, but there are still people in the village... I better defeat as many monsters as I can along the way.=我想省钱Miria 尽快，但村里还有人...我最好一路上尽可能多地打败怪物。
Huh...? Polon...!?=呵呵...？Polon...！？
That ribbon... It's Miria's...! Where did you find that...?=那条丝带...它是Miria's你在哪里找到的...？
Woof... Woof... *Whine*!=汪汪呜呜*呜呜！
You found it on the ground up ahead? But the monsters... It's so dangerous...=你在前面的地上找到的？但是怪物...太危险了...
Polon... I'm going to go save Miria...=Polon...我要去救人Miria...
*Whine*...=*呜呜*...
This place is too dangerous for you... Polon, please go back to the village and help Donny and the others!=这个地方对你来说太危险了...Polon，请回到村子里去帮助Donny和其他人！
Woof... Woof...!=汪汪汪汪
Woof... Grrrr...!=汪汪Grrrr...！
U-Um... Miss Fairy... Thank you.=嗯...仙女小姐...非常感谢。
For what?=为了什么？
You know... For saving me from the goblins...and helping me look for my sister...=你知道的...为了救我脱离哥布林...帮我找我姐姐...
The goblins...? My head was fuzzy when I gave you your powers, so I don't remember it well...=哥布林...？当我给你力量的时候，我的头很模糊，所以我记不清了...
But God sent me to deliver the brooch to the holy knight and help her carry out her duty. I'm just fulfilling my mission.=但上帝派我把胸针交给圣骑士 帮助她履行职责。我只是在完成我的使命。
I see... That reminds me, I have something I wanted to ask you...=我懂了...这提醒了我，我有件事想问你...
What is this transformation...? And what do you mean, "duty"...? I look like a knight out of a fairy tale...=这是什么转变...？你说的“责任”是什么意思...？我看起来像童话里的骑士...
That's exactly what you are.=你就是这样。
I said this to you at the church, but you were chosen by God to become the legendary holy knight to defeat monsters and save this world.=我在教堂里对你说过，但你是被上帝选中成为传奇人物的圣骑士 打败怪物拯救这个世界。
Wha...? Huh...!? Are you serious...? No, you have to be joking...=什么...？呵呵...！？你是认真的吗...？不，你一定是在开玩笑...
I don't like joking around.=我不喜欢开玩笑。
S-Sorry... But... Why me...?=抱歉...但是为什么是我...？
I'm just a normal village girl! I've never even touched a big sword like this before!=我只是一个普通的乡村女孩！我从没碰过这么大的剑！
Don't ask me. I don't know either.=别问我。我也不知道。
But you look exactly like what God described, and you did receive his powers and became a knight, so there should be no problem.=但你看起来和上帝描述的一模一样，你确实获得了他的力量，成为了一名骑士，所以应该没有问题。
Yup.=是的。
But me...? I'm supposed to fight monsters and save people...? I can't...=但我...？我应该去和怪物战斗，拯救人类...？我不能...
True, you do look like any other human girl...but if God chose you, things should go just fine.=没错，你看起来和其他人类女孩一样...但如果上帝选择了你，一切都会好起来的。
<b>Beware of chasms!</b>\r\n If you fall into any of the various holes scattering the land,\r\n your HP will be reduced to 0.\r\n Be sure to jump over them.=<b>当心裂缝！</b>\r\n 如果你掉进散落在地上的任何一个洞里，\n你的生命将减少到0。\n一定要跳过它们。
God chose me...? Why me...?=上帝选择了我...？为什么是我...？
Eep! A giant caterpillar!? Ugh, it's squirming...=Eep！一只巨大的毛虫！？呃，它在蠕动...
It's a hell beetle. They're insects that've turned into monsters. Their larvae spit out threads, and the fully grown ones attack from the air, so be careful.=这是一只地狱甲虫。它们是变成怪物的昆虫。它们的幼虫吐出丝线，而成年的幼虫则从空中攻击，所以要小心。
<b>Fire Sword Crystal</b>\r\n Collecting a fire sword crystal\r\n will infuse your weapon with the power of fire for a short time.\r\n You can deal periodic burn damage to weak enemies\r\n and deal massive damage to undead\r\n and other enemies with a low body temperature.=<b>火剑水晶</b>\r\n 收集火剑水晶\n将在短时间内给你的武器注入火力。\n你可以对弱小的敌人造成周期性的燃烧伤害\n对不死生物造成巨大伤害\n和其他体温低的敌人。
O-Okay, I'll watch out... You said they turned into monsters, right? So these bugs used to be normal caterpillars like the kind I see in the mountains...=好吧，我会小心的...你说他们变成了怪物，对吗？所以这些虫 以前是正常的毛虫，就像我在山上看到的那种...
<b>Ascend ladders/Grab in mid-air</b>\r\n Keyboard:↑ Key\r\n Controller:2- Axis<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Descend ladders</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard:↓ Key\r\n Controller:2+ Axis<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Let go of ladders</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard:Z Key\r\n Controller:3 Button=<b>爬上梯子/在半空中抓取</b>\r\n 键盘：↑ 钥匙\n控制器：2轴<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>下梯子</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n 键盘：↓ 键\n控制器：2+轴<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>放下梯子</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n 键盘：Z键\n手柄：3按钮
Upon defeat\r\n"Kidnapped by highwaymen" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=战败时\n“被强盗绑架”\nH场景（已经看过）
All the plants have withered... The atmosphere is so eerie... This place wasn't like this the last time I came this way...=所有的植物都枯萎了...气氛太诡异了...上次我来的时候这里不是这样的...
A big red gem...! It looks like a Magic Stone, but...=一颗巨大的红色宝石...！它看起来像一块魔法石，但是...
It's shiny and pretty, but something feels off about it... I didn't see anything like this when I passed by this place a while ago...=它又亮又漂亮，但感觉有些不对劲...我前段时间路过这个地方时，没有看到这样的东西...
That's a Drain Crystal. It's a magic tool that accumulates and transfers magic energy. I suspected there was one nearby...=这是个好主意黑暗水晶. 这是一个积累和传递魔法能量的神奇工具。我怀疑附近有一个...
This crystal is absorbing the magic of this land and transferring it somewhere else. On top of that, it's transforming some of the magic into a wave of evil energy that attracts and empowers monsters.=这颗水晶正在吸收这片土地的魔力，并将其转移到其他地方。最重要的是，它将一些魔法转化为一股邪恶能量，吸引并赋予怪物力量。
So that's why the monsters have been restless lately... And the plants around here are withered because the crystal took their energy...=这就是为什么怪物们最近不安...这附近的植物都枯萎了，因为水晶带走了它们的能量...
Exactly; this is the root cause. If we don't get rid of this, the whole mountain will become withered and overrun by monsters.=确切地这是根本原因。如果我们不把它除掉，整座山都会枯萎，被怪物吞噬。
No... That's awful... Who would put this here...?=不太可怕了...谁会把这个放在这里...？
It's probably the work of Archlich. I'm sure the absorbed magic is sent to him, too.=这可能是Archlich的作品。我相信他也会被魔法吸引。
Ark-Rich...? The goblins said something about him, too...=阿克Ricca...？哥布林们也提到了他...
I'll explain more later. Let's just break the Drain Crystal first. Then the monsters will gradually disappear and the mountain will return to its original state.=我以后再解释。让我们打破僵局吧黑暗水晶 第一然后怪物会逐渐消失，山也会回到原来的状态。
Okay, I got it.=好的，我明白了。
There might be more Drain Crystals along the way. Let's break any that we come across.=可能还有更多黑暗水晶一路走来。让我们打破任何我们遇到的。
Crystals that attract monsters... Who would do such a thing...?=吸引怪物的水晶...谁会做这样的事...？
This is the work of Archlich, the wicked necromancer.=这是邪恶的亡灵巫师阿奇Ricca的作品。
Archlich...?=阿奇Ricca...？
He's an evil wizard who once manipulated monsters to ravage the world. The legendary holy knight was the one who defeated him.=他是一个邪恶的巫师，曾经操纵怪物来蹂躏世界。传奇人物圣骑士 就是那个打败他的人。
I think I remember a fairy tale about that... But that wizard was defeated, right? So why...?=我想我记得一个童话故事...但那个巫师被打败了，对吗？那为什么...？
It seems that he has resurrected. Necromancy is magic that came from researching ways to obtain immortality, so he must have used that power.=他似乎复活了。巫术是一种魔法，来自于研究获得不朽的方法，所以他一定使用了这种力量。
God needed someone to defeat the evil wizard, and chose to bestow you with the power, and the duty.=上帝需要有人来击败邪恶的巫师，并选择赋予你力量和责任。
God...chose me...? Why...?=上帝选择了我...？为什么？
Like I said, I don't know either. But you want to defeat monsters and save mankind, right?=就像我说的，我也不知道。但你想打败怪物拯救人类，对吗？
(<indent%3D0.4em>Save mankind...? Right, I'm going to save everyone... Including Miria...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>拯救人类...？好吧，我要拯救所有人...包括...在内Miria...)
What's wrong? Let's get going.=发生了什么？我们走吧。
Um... Uh... Miss Fairy... What's your name...? I-If I may ask...=嗯...UH仙女小姐...你叫什么名字...？请允许我问一下...
Name...? Well, God gave me the name "Iris" when I became his servant...=名称上帝给了我这个名字“Iris“当我成为他的仆人时...
You don't have to be uptight around me. I don't want to see you get all awkward.=你不必在我身边紧张。我不想看到你变得很尴尬。
Th-Thank you very... I mean, okay. Then I'll be calling you Iris from now on. Teehee...=非常感谢你...我是说，好吧。那我就给你打电话Iris 从现在开始蒂希...
Hmph... Whatever...=嗯...无论什么
Heehee, you can call me Ricca, too...=嘿嘿，你可以打电话给我Ricca, 也
Huh...? Miss Fairy...? Iris...?=呵呵...？仙女小姐...？Iris...?
I can sense waves of evil from that direction. It must be a Drain Crystal.=我能感觉到来自那个方向的邪恶浪潮。这一定是一场灾难黑暗水晶.
I think that's where the valley is... That's the shortest path to the foot of the mountain.=我想那就是山谷的所在...那是到山脚下最短的路。
So the goblins who kidnapped Miria are the same as the ones who attacked the settlement... Let's hurry!=那么绑架我的小妖精Miria 和袭击定居点的人一样...我们快点！
Chapter 3    Red Stone=第 3.章    红魔法石
The bridge is broken... That's too bad. Crossing this valley was the closest path to the foot of the mountain.=桥断了...那太糟糕了。穿过这个山谷是离山脚最近的一条路。
It's a little too high to get over... It'll take us a bit more time, but let's find a path where the terrain is lower.=有点太高了，无法克服...我们需要更多的时间，但是让我们找一条地势较低的路。
Hold on. You have the power to climb this cliff now.=等等你现在有能力爬上这座悬崖。
What do you mean?=什么意思？
You got a lot of Magic Stones from defeating the golem and destroying the Drain Crystal, right? You can use them here.=你从击败傀儡和摧毁魔法石中获得了很多魔法石黑暗水晶, 正当你可以在这里用。
Magic Stones...? What am I supposed to do with those things...? If I don't hurry, the goblins might hurt Miria...=魔法石...？我该拿这些东西怎么办...？如果我不快点，哥布林们可能会受伤Miria...
Just listen to what I have to say. It'll help us get to her faster.=听我说。这会帮助我们更快地找到她。
Alright... I'll listen.=好吧我会听的。
First, put your hand on the ornament on your chest... The red stone shaped like the sun on your brooch.=首先，把手放在胸前的装饰品上...你的胸针形状像太阳。
Like this?=这样地？
Exactly. Now don't move.=确切地现在别动。
Hah!=哈！

Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 5 The Revived Stone Giant?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第 5.章 复活的石头巨人?
Steep Path=陡峭的道路
The village that was attacked by monsters is in the forest beyond the hill...=被怪物袭击的村庄在山那边的森林里...
Looks like you've rested and recovered plenty of magic. You should be good to fight now.=看来你已经休息了，恢复了很多魔法。你现在应该准备好战斗了。
Th-The ground... I think it just shook a little... That scared me...=地面上...我想只是有点摇晃...这让我害怕...
An earthquake...? You humans get scared of the smallest things...=地震...？你们人类害怕最小的东西...
Hmm... But the mayor said that this area rarely gets earthquakes... It must have been my imagination. Let's keep going!=嗯... 但是市长说这个地区很少发生地震...那一定是我的想象。让我们继续！
The morning sun's too bright... Huff, nnngh... My tummy's rumbling...=早晨的太阳太亮了...哈夫，嗯...我的肚子隆隆作响...
It must be the slime juice... It feels like... Like... There's something moving at the bottom of my stomach... Uugh...=一定是那个史莱姆 果汁感觉就像...喜欢我的胃底部有东西在动...啊...
Hehe, I know you liked it, but you shouldn't have drunk as much as you did. Now quit complaining and get moving.=呵呵，我知道你喜欢，但你不该喝那么多。现在停止抱怨，开始行动吧。
<b>Order Iris to attack</b>\r\n Keyboard:X Key\r\n Controller:1 Button<line-height%3D150%>\r\nIris will attack nearby enemy.=<b>顺序Iris 攻击</b>\r\n 键盘：X键\n控制员：1按钮<line-height%3D150%>\r\nIris 将攻击附近的敌人。
A big red flower... It's covered in thorns. I might get hurt if I touch it.=一朵大红花...满是荆棘。如果我碰它，我可能会受伤。
That plant became a demon plant through the influence of the Drain Crystal. It'll hurt you if you touch it carelessly.=那株植物在黑暗势力的影响下变成了恶魔植物黑暗水晶. 如果你不小心碰它，它会伤害你的。
Some monster plants spit out seeds that infest humans. If that happens to you, you need to cut the vines off immediately, or else your whole body will get trapped in vines.=一些怪兽植物吐出的种子会感染人类。如果这种情况发生在你身上，你需要立即砍掉葡萄藤，否则你的整个身体都会被困在葡萄藤里。
Upon grapple defeat by Hell Plant Seedling\r\n"Parasitic plant seedbed" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=在被地狱植物幼苗击败后\n“寄生植物苗床”\nH场景（已经看过）
Trapped in vines...? What happens then?=被困在藤蔓里...？然后呢？
A red flower about the same size as you will bloom at the spot you get trapped in.=一朵红色的花，大小和你被困的地方一样。
We can't move forward because that dead tree is in the way.=我们不能前进，因为那棵枯树挡住了我们的去路。
Looks like we have to find another way around.=看来我们得另辟蹊径了。
You can easily cut down a dead tree like that with your weapon.=你可以用你的武器轻易地砍倒一棵这样的枯树。
Huh? But wouldn't it be faster to just go around it?=嗯？但是绕过它不是更快吗？
I think it would be good practice for getting used to your holy knight weapon.=我认为这将是一个很好的习惯你的圣骑士 武器
Alright... I'll cut it down...=好吧我会把它砍下来...
Phew, we're finally at the top of the hill... All we need to do now is head down and...=我们终于到山顶了...我们现在需要做的就是低头...
The ground shook again... Was that another earthquake...?=地面再次震动...那是另一场地震吗...？
Ugh... I didn't expect it to happen twice...=呃...我没想到会发生两次...
But I can't stop now... Once we head down this hill and into the woods, we should be at the settlement. Then I can ask the people there about the monsters and Miria...=但我现在不能停止...一旦我们下山进入树林，我们就应该到营地了。然后我可以问那里的人关于怪物和Miria...
I feel something...approaching...=我感觉到...接近...
Eeek...! A-Another earthquake...!? Why does this keep happening...!?=哎呀...！又一次地震...！？为什么这种事一直发生...！？
The vibration from the earth...and this magic energy...=来自地球的振动...而这种神奇的能量...
Huh!? Eeeeeeeeeeeek!=呵呵！？哎呀！
Mission : Escape from the Stone Golem=任务：逃离石头傀儡
I-Is that the golem!? But I defeated it... It's rolling this way!=那是傀儡吗！？但我打败了它...朝这边滚！
It must have resurrected after we beat it at the village. We should have made sure it was dead.=我们在村子里打败它之后，它一定复活了。我们应该确定它死了。
It's too late for that... Agh, we don't have time to talk about this! Besides, isn't that golem bigger than before!?=现在已经太晚了...啊，我们没时间谈这个！再说，那个傀儡不是比以前更大了吗！？
It must have accumulated soil and rocks, growing larger as it traveled here. Be careful. Even with protection, you'll be crushed to a pulp if that giant rolls over you.=它一定是堆积了土壤和岩石，在这里旅行时变得越来越大。小心。即使有保护措施，如果巨人从你身上滚下来，你也会被碾碎成浆。
No way...! I-I can't get run over... We need to run!=不可能...！我不能被碾过...我们得跑了！
Haa... Haa... Nngh... Haa... H-How far is it going to follow us!?=哈...哈...嗯...哈...它会跟我们走多远！？
I'm going ahead. Be careful not to get crushed by it.=我继续。小心别被它压碎。
Iris, no...! You're so mean! Wait! Wait for me!=Iris, 不你真卑鄙！等待等等我！
A dead end!?=死胡同！？
Don't give up! Use your magic sword to make a platform!=不要放弃！用你的魔法剑做一个平台！
Haa... Haa... It's finally down...=哈...哈...终于下来了...
I doubt it'll come back alive now that it's broken into pieces.=我怀疑它会活着回来，因为它已经破碎了。
Huff... Huff... I can't believe you ran away without me, Iris... Haa... Haa...=生气地说生气地说我不敢相信你没有我就跑了，Iris... 哈...哈...
Heehee... Come on, you were able to escape it. And thanks to your hard work, we were able to beat the golem without even fighting it.=嘿嘿...拜托，你能逃脱的。多亏了你的努力，我们甚至不用与傀儡搏斗就能打败它。
Is that...huff, huff...supposed to make me...feel better...?=那是...哈夫，哈夫...应该让我...感觉好点了吗...？
Haa... There goes...all my energy... Now I need to rest again...after running...huff, huff...with all my might...=哈...就这样...我所有的精力...现在我需要再次休息...跑步之后...哈夫，哈夫...尽我所能...
I'm sorry... I just...need a minute...=我很抱歉...我只是...需要一分钟...
Alright. In the meantime, I'll go look at the remains of the golem. I might find clues about the monsters who attacked the village.=好吧与此同时，我要去看看傀儡的遗骸。我也许能找到袭击村子的怪物的线索。
Ugh... I'm so sweaty... Even my clothes and hair are wet... Oh, right... I'm supposed to return to my normal form when I rest...=呃...我浑身都是汗...甚至我的衣服和头发都湿了...哦，对了...我应该在休息时恢复正常状态...
Phew... We should get going now. Okay, so I place the brooch on my chest...and imagine myself as a knight...=呸...我们该走了。好吧，我把胸针放在胸前...把自己想象成骑士...
(<indent%3D0.4em>Miria...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>Miria...)
(<indent%3D0.4em>The sword and armor are a bit much, but the hair ornaments and white gloves that come with the holy knight form are kinda cute. They remind me of Olivia at her wedding... She was beautiful, and she looked so happy with her groom...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>剑和盔甲有点多，但护发器和白手套都是随附的圣骑士 他们有点可爱。它们让我想起Olivia 在她的婚礼上...她很漂亮，和新郎在一起看起来很开心......）
(<indent%3D0.4em>She's probably safe from the monsters in the capital...but she's going to be so sad when she finds out that all those people in the village died...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>她可能在首都的怪物面前很安全...但当她发现村里所有的人都死了时，她会非常伤心......）
Huh...? Oh, I see. So my sweat is cleaned when I transform...=呵呵...？哦，我明白了。所以当我变形时，我的汗水会被清洗干净...
(<indent%3D0.4em>Did all the filth from the goblins disappear...when I transformed for the first time in the church...?)=(<indent%3D0.4em>哥布林身上所有的污秽都消失了吗...当我在教堂里第一次转变时...？）
(<indent%3D0.4em>I...hope so...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我希望如此......）
Iris, I'm done resting!=Iris, 我休息完了！
This rock... There are bits of metal in it... I think it's copper...=这块石头...里面有一些金属碎片...我想是铜的...
It must have been made out of mined rock... Does that mean the monsters' base is there?=它一定是由开采的岩石制成的...这是否意味着怪物的基地就在那里？
Iris, was that golem made by that bad wizard Archlich?=Iris, 那个傀儡是那个坏巫师阿奇Ricca做的吗？
Huh...? Y-Yes. A golem this big, strong and persistent couldn't have been made by a goblin.=呵呵...？是的。这么大、这么强壮、这么执着的傀儡是哥布林做不出来的。
Okaaay... Well, I'm done resting.=好吧...我休息完了。
Oh, are you? Then let's head out.=哦，是吗？那我们出发吧。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Miria... I hope you're safe...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>Miria... 我希望你安全......）
Chapter 5    The Revived Stone Giant=第 5.章    复活的石头巨人
We're so close to reaching the forest at the foot of the mountain, too... Ouch... Ack... It didn't hurt this much earlier...=我们也快到山脚下的森林了...哎哟确认...早就没这么疼了...
Your body is strengthened with holy power during battle and suppresses pain so you can focus on fighting. Is this the spot the beetle horn hit you?=你的身体在战斗中会被神圣力量强化，并抑制疼痛，因此你可以专注于战斗。这就是甲壳虫角击中你的地方吗？
Eek! Th-That's it. Ouch... Hnnngh... Owww... Huff... Huff... Be gentle with it...=哎呀！就这样。哎哟嗯...哦...生气地说生气地说温柔一点...
Oh, sorry.=哦，对不起。
Ugh... Will you stop slapping it?=呃...你能不能别拍了？
*Sigh* How does it look? It's not bleeding and it doesn't hurt as long as I don't move it, so it's not too bad, right?=*唉* 看起来怎么样？只要我不动它就不会流血也不会痛，所以也不算太糟，对吧？
Well, from the looks of it... Your bone isn't badly broken, but it might have a fracture. You should rest until it heals.=从表面上看...你的骨头没有严重骨折，但可能骨折了。你应该休息直到痊愈。
Don't worry, you just have to wait for the holy knight healing powers to kick in.=别担心，你只需要等待圣骑士 有治疗能力。
A fracture in my bone...!? It's that bad!? No wonder it hurt... How long do I have to wait?=我的骨头骨折了...！？真糟糕！？难怪疼...我要等多久？
If you focus your magic on your injury, it should take about half a day. If we want to be safe, though, we should rest for a whole day.=如果你把你的魔法集中在你的受伤上，应该需要大约半天的时间。如果我们想安全，我们应该休息一整天。
That long? I just recovered from running a moment ago, too... I need to go save Miria...=那么长？我刚才也刚从跑步中恢复过来...我得去救他Miria...
If you were a normal human, this would take you months to recover from. I know you're in a hurry, but we can't go forward if you can't fight monsters. Don't leave your guard down next time.=如果你是一个正常人，这将需要几个月的时间来恢复。我知道你赶时间，但如果你不能和怪物战斗，我们就不能前进。下次不要放松警惕。
Ngh... Okay... I understand...=嗯...可以我理解...
...I'm sorry...Miria...=...我很抱歉...Miria...
Fine, fine. Just give me a sec.=很好，很好。等我一下。
We have Magic Stones... I prefer to use these for creating equipment and strengthening abilities, but...=我们有魔法石...我更喜欢用这些来创造装备和增强能力，但是...
Here's a Life Crystal. Just sprinkle the recovery magic inside this thing over your injury and it'll heal in the blink of an eye.=这是一个生命水晶。只要在你的伤口上撒上恢复魔法，它就会在眨眼间愈合。
Wow... Did you make that crystal out of Magic Stones?=哇！那水晶是你用魔法石做的吗？
Yes. You can use Magic Stones to strengthen your holy knight abilities and make other useful crystals for battle.=对你可以用魔法石来增强你的力量圣骑士 技能和其他有用的战斗水晶。
I thought you humans knew about this too.=我以为你们人类也知道。
Now that you mention it, I think I saw something about that in a book at the general store. The mayor told me about it a long time ago, too.=既然你提到了，我想我在杂货店的一本书中看到了这方面的东西。市长很久以前也告诉过我这件事。
Hehe... So that's why the travelers that visit my village buy Magic Stones. They were using them to make crystals like this.=呵呵...这就是为什么来我们村的游客会买魔法石。他们用它们来制作这样的晶体。
Most likely. Converting Magic Stones into other crystals takes a couple of steps, but anyone can do it once they get the hang of it. I'll teach you too.=很有可能。将魔法石转化为其他水晶需要几个步骤，但任何人只要掌握了窍门就可以做到。我也会教你的。
Oh, really? I'd love to know.=哦，真的吗？我很想知道。
Heheh, I'm fine with teaching you, but making useful crystals takes a lot of Magic Stones. That'll mean fewer stones for strengthening abilities and creating equipment, so you better keep your priorities in mind.=呵呵，我很乐意教你，但是制作有用的水晶需要很多魔法石。这将意味着用于增强能力和创造装备的石头更少，所以你最好记住你的优先事项。

Ominous Swamp=不祥沼泽

Urk... Nngh... Haa... Haa... Huff... Nngh... Ugh...=乌尔克。。。嗯。。。哈。。。哈。。。生气地说嗯。。。呃。。。
(<indent%3D0.4em>My body... It sometimes starts to throb and yearn for pleasure because of the curse...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我的身体。。。有点次 因为诅咒开始悸动，渴望快乐……）
(<indent%3D0.4em>I occasionally touch myself a little...while Iris is asleep... But I'm God's servant, his holy knight... I shouldn't be so naughty... So corrupted... If Iris found out...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我偶尔摸一下自己。。。虽然Iris 她睡着了。。。但我是上帝的仆人，他的神圣骑士。。。我不该这么调皮。。。如此堕落。。。如果Iris 发现…）
Uugh... Nngh, aah... Huff, huff... Nngh... Haa...=啊。。。啊，啊。。。哈夫，哈夫。。。嗯。。。哈。。。
Your curse is aching again, huh? Hold still for a sec; I'll re-apply the seal.=你的诅咒又开始痛了吧？等一下；我会重新盖上封条。
Haa... Haa... Iris... Thank you...=哈。。。哈。。。Iris... 非常感谢。
It gets stronger when there are monsters nearby... It must react to evil magic. Ugh, you just had to get cursed, didn't you?=当附近有怪物时，它会变得更强大。。。它必须对邪恶的魔法做出反应。你只是被诅咒了，不是吗？
Heh... I-I'm sorry...=嘿。。。对不起。。。
Um... Iris...? Is there a Drain Crystal around here?=嗯。。。Iris...? 这附近有排水水晶吗？
There is... I can sense evil magic being released from the depths of this swamp.=有。。。我能感觉到邪恶的魔法正从沼泽深处释放出来。
We can reduce the number of monsters by destroying the Drain Crystal, right?=我们可以通过摧毁排水水晶来减少怪物的数量，对吗？
That's right. Drain Crystals absorb the magic from the earth and transfer it elsewhere while emitting waves of evil, attracting monsters and driving them wild.=这是正确的。排水水晶吸收来自地球的魔法，并将其转移到其他地方，同时释放出邪恶的浪潮，吸引怪物并将其赶走。
Once the Drain Crystal is destroyed, the number of monsters will decrease. You'll get a load of Magic Stones to strengthen your abilities with, too. Like killing two birds with one stone.=一旦排水水晶被摧毁，怪物的数量就会减少。你也会得到大量魔法石来增强你的能力。就像一石二鸟。
When you were defeated at the goblin fortress...I realized that you aren't strong enough to beat Archlich or even that demon woman yet...=当你在哥布林要塞被击败时。。。我意识到你还没有强大到足以打败阿奇Ricca甚至那个恶魔女人。。。
The magic I felt from her was on a different level. It seems like she's able to disguise herself as a human, too. We can't just ignore her.=我从她身上感受到的魔力在另一个层面上。看起来她也能把自己伪装成人类。我们不能忽视她。
You want to get your sister back from the monsters, don't you? If you keep strengthening your holy knight abilities, even an idiot like you will have a chance to defeat them.=你想把你妹妹从怪物那里救回来，是吗？如果你继续强化你的神圣骑士能力，即使像你这样的白痴也有机会打败他们。
...Idiot...=...蠢人
Oww... Alright. Let's keep looking for more Drain Crystals to destroy.=哦。。。好吧让我们继续寻找更多的排水晶体破坏。
x11=x11
The Drain Crystal is some distance ahead... I guess we have to get through the swamp to reach it.=排水晶体在前面一段距离。。。我想我们得穿过沼泽才能到达。
It doesn't look that deep, but the mud will get caught on your legs and slow your movements. It'll make it harder to dodge enemy attacks, so try to walk on land when possible.=看起来没那么深，但泥巴会沾到你的腿上，减缓你的动作。这将使躲避敌人的攻击变得更加困难，所以尽可能在陆地上行走。
Okay. Although, I'm sad that it'll ruin my outfit right after it was repaired... The swamp water's so muddy and filthy...=可以虽然，我很难过，它会毁了我的衣服后，它被修复。。。沼泽的水又脏又泥泞。。。
x2=x2
Worrying about filth isn't going to get us any closer to the Crystal. Still, we don't know what could be lurking in the swamp, so be careful.=担心污秽不会让我们离水晶更近。尽管如此，我们仍然不知道沼泽中可能隐藏着什么，所以要小心。
There's a hell plant here too...=这里也有地狱植物。。。
The evil magic of the Drain Crystal must have affected the vegetation around here.=排水水晶的邪恶魔力一定影响了这里的植被。
X Key / 1 Button=十、键 / 1.按钮
The red and blue lotus leaves seem to move in response to your magic. It could be useful for us to move forward.=红色和蓝色的荷叶似乎随着你的魔法而移动。这对我们向前迈进可能是有益的。
Upon grapple defeat by Mudrot Orc\r\n"Mud orc assimilation" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=在被穆德洛特兽人击败后\n“泥兽人同化”\nH场景（已经看过）

I think...that's an undead orc.=我想。。。那是一个不死兽人。
Orc? Those are the pig-faced monsters, right...?=兽人？那些是猪脸怪物，对吧。。。？
Yes. They're green demi-humans like goblins, but they're much larger and greedier.=对他们是像哥布林一样的绿色半人，但他们更大更贪婪。
Open=打开
I'm guessing it got stuck in the swamp and died, then the Drain Crystal's magic reanimated its corpse.=我猜它被困在沼泽里死了，然后排水水晶的魔法让它的尸体复活了。
It looks like it can't move from that spot, but watch out.=看起来它不能从那个地方移动，但要小心。
That monster has acidic vomit made of gastric acid and spoiled food in its stomach. If it barfs on you, your armor and clothes are going to melt away.=那怪物胃里有由胃酸和变质食物组成的酸性呕吐物。如果它吐在你身上，你的盔甲和衣服就会融化。
Melt away...!? Ugh, that's disgusting! I'm not letting that get on me!=融化掉。。。！？真恶心！我不会让这件事影响我的！
Some monsters are weak to elements like fire and ice. Hell beetles and monsters that live in water tend to be vulnerable to lightning.=有些怪物对火和冰等元素很弱。生活在水中的地狱甲虫和怪物往往容易受到闪电的伤害。
By the way, your holy knight armor and gauntlet are weak to lightning, too.=顺便说一句，你的神圣骑士盔甲和护手对闪电也很弱。
I see... So that's why my demon sister's lightning magic hurt so much...=我懂了。。。所以这就是为什么我的恶魔姐姐的闪电魔法如此之痛。。。
Obtained Silver Magic Stone=获得银魔法石
Your armor's divine protection reduces damage, though, so it should save you from fatal wounds. What I'm worried about is you exaggerating the pain and getting caught while you're busy whining...=不过，你的盔甲的神圣保护可以减少伤害，所以它可以让你免于致命伤。我担心的是你夸大了痛苦，在你忙着抱怨的时候被抓住了。。。
Are you sure about divine protection? Miria's purple lightning hurt so much, I couldn't move my body.=你确定神的保护吗？米莉亚的紫色闪电太刺痛了，我无法移动我的身体。
Don't talk like that - you're a holy knight! Gosh, you really need to learn to persevere... Your big sister Miria spoiled you rotten, didn't she?=别这么说-你是个神圣的骑士！天哪，你真的需要学会坚持。。。你姐姐Miria把你宠坏了，是吗？
You don't have to say it like that... Ugh... That's not...true...=你不必那样说。。。呃。。。那不是。。。符合事实的
Hell beetles... They're dangerous on land, but I especially don't want to deal with them around these swamps...=地狱甲虫。。。它们在陆地上很危险，但我尤其不想在沼泽地附近与它们打交道。。。
If you can't avoid their attacks in the mud, you can strike them right as they come at you.=如果你无法避免他们在泥泞中的攻击，你可以在他们向你袭来时直接攻击他们。
<b>Thunder Sword Crystal</b>\r\n Collecting a thunder sword crystal\r\n will infuse your weapon with the power of lightning for a short time.\r\n You can shock weak enemies to stop them in their tracks\r\n and deal massive damage to\r\n aquatic monsters, insects, birds or enemies who wear armor.=<b>雷剑水晶</b>\r\n 收集雷霆剑水晶\n将在短时间内给你的武器注入闪电的力量。\n你可以震慑弱小的敌人，阻止他们前进\n并对其造成巨大损害\n水生怪物、昆虫、鸟类或穿盔甲的敌人。
Your weapon has been infused with Lightning magic=你的武器被注入了闪电魔法
Eww... My whole body's covered in mud...=哎呀。。。我全身都是泥。。。
My hands and feet are a mess, too... It feels so gross... Ugh... I smell like mud...=我的手和脚也一团糟。。。感觉太恶心了。。。呃。。。我闻起来像泥。。。
Heehee... But I just need to switch back to my normal form...=嘿嘿。。。但我只需要回到我的正常状态。。。
...and immediately transform again, and I'll be clean!=...马上再变一次，我就干净了！
(<indent%3D0.4em>Yup... All clean and pure... If I keep repeating the transformation, the inside of my stomach should become clean... I can get rid of all the filth the goblins put in me...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>是的。。。一切都干净纯净。。。如果我不断重复这个转变，我的胃内部应该会变得干净。。。我可以把哥布林放在我身上的所有污垢都清除掉……）
Heehee... Heeheehee...! God gave me such wonderful powers! So convenient!=嘿嘿。。。嘿嘿。。。！上帝给了我如此奇妙的力量！太方便了！
Hey, every time you transform into a holy knight, you consume magic. I know you want to be clean, but you've been transforming way too much lately. Can't you put up with a bit of dirt?=嘿，每次你变成神圣骑士，你都会消耗魔法。我知道你想保持清白，但你最近改变太多了。你不能忍受一点灰尘吗？
Huh... H-Have I...? Alright...=呵呵。。。我有没有。。。？好吧
I can feel the magic from a Drain Crystal in that direction. Let's go.=我能从那个方向的排水晶体中感受到魔力。走吧。
Okay... Ah, wait up, Iris...!=可以等等，Iris...!
On the way through the swamp to break another Drain Crystal...=在穿过沼泽去打破另一个排水水晶的路上。。。
(<indent%3D0.4em>*Sigh*)=(<indent%3D0.4em>*叹息*）
(<indent%3D0.4em>It's been about a week since we left the goblin fortress, but she's still in a bad mood... I guess it only makes sense. I'm always making her angry...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我们离开哥布林要塞已经一周了，但她仍然心情不好。。。我想这是有道理的。我总是让她生气……）
(<indent%3D0.4em>She only talks to me to reseal my curse, even when we're walking together... She hasn't found out about the goblins raping me...or what I do while she's asleep...has she?)=(<indent%3D0.4em>她只会跟我说话来解除我的诅咒，即使我们在一起散步的时候。。。她还没发现妖精强奸我的事。。。或者我在她睡觉的时候做什么。。。她有吗？）
(<indent%3D0.4em>But... Ugh... This is so awkward... I don't want it to be like this forever... I wanna get along with her...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>但是呃。。。这太尴尬了。。。我不想永远这样。。。我想和她相处……）
U-Um... Iris...?=嗯。。。Iris...?
What is it?=这是怎么一回事？
Umm, you're God's servant... I mean, God's messenger, right?=你是上帝的仆人。。。我是说，上帝的使者，对吧？
What about it?=怎么样？
What kind of person is God...? Oh, I guess he isn't a person, heehee... You've talked to him directly, right?=上帝是什么样的人。。。？哦，我猜他不是一个人，嘿嘿。。。你直接跟他谈过，对吧？Why do you want to know?=你为什么想知道？
Huh...? Why...? Well... Um, I'm just surprised that God really exists...and I wanted to know more about you...=呵呵。。。？为什么？好我只是很惊讶上帝真的存在。。。我想更多地了解你。。。
Hmph... Fine. I suppose you have the right to know. This is going to take a while to explain...=嗯。。。好的我想你有权知道。这需要一段时间来解释。。。
My fellow fairies and I live in a forest in the mountains far northeast of here.=我和我的仙女们住在这里东北偏僻山区的一片森林里。
Mountains far northeast... Aren't those mountains super tall...?=远在东北的山脉。。。那些山不是很高吗。。。？
Yes, they are. My ancestors lived quietly in that forest surround by mountains. It was a peaceful land very few approached.=是的。我的祖先安静地生活在群山环绕的森林里。这是一片很少有人接近的宁静之地。
Yet suddenly, ferocious monsters began to appear... Just like this area.=然而突然，凶猛的怪物开始出现。。。就像这个地区。
So our ancestors climbed the mountain and prayed. Then God came down from the heavens before them...=所以我们的祖先爬上山祈祷。然后上帝在他们面前从天而降。。。
...and drove away the monsters with a dazzling light, shining like the sun.=...用耀眼的光芒赶走了怪物，像太阳一样闪耀。
Well, that's the folklore that's been passed down in our village through the ages, but God really does periodically come to the forest to put up barriers and drive away foreign invaders with magic.=好吧，这是我们村子里流传多年的民间传说，但上帝确实会定期来到森林里设置屏障，用魔法赶走外国侵略者。
Huh... To be honest, it didn't really hit me even after I was chosen to be a holy knight, but... I guess God really does exist.=呵呵。。。说实话，即使在我被选为神圣骑士后，我也没有真正受到打击，但是。。。我想上帝真的存在。
Yes, but unlike what you humans believe, God isn't actually all-powerful...=是的，但和你们人类所相信的不同，上帝并不是万能的。。。
Our God is probably more like a high-ranking spirit or something close to a wraith... No, I shouldn't think like that - it's disrespectful...=我们的神可能更像是一个高级精灵或是一个接近幽灵的东西。。。不，我不应该那样想-这是不尊重。。。
In any case, God uses holy light magic to keep the balance between living creatures and protect us, just like the myth says.=在任何情况下，上帝使用圣光魔法来保持生物之间的平衡并保护我们，就像神话所说的那样。
God wants peace for this world and its inhabitants, and we fairies help our God by collecting information from various places, sometimes becoming God's hands and feet. That's how we return the favor for God protecting us.=上帝希望这个世界和它的居民和平，我们仙女通过从不同的地方收集信息来帮助我们的上帝，有些地方次 成为神的手和脚。这就是我们回报上帝保护我们的方式。
I see... So what kind of person... What kind of God is he?=我懂了。。。那么什么样的人。。。他是什么样的上帝？
I don't mean to toot my own horn, but I was one of the most outstanding among the young fairies of my village. I wasn't just made God's servant, I was given a name.=我不是故意吹嘘自己，但我是村里最杰出的小仙女之一。我不仅仅是上帝的仆人，我还被赋予了一个名字。
God always takes the form of a woman when she appears in our village. She looks dignified, but she's also very kind.=当女人出现在我们村子里时，上帝总是以女人的形象出现。她看起来很端庄，但也很善良。
Oh? So she was a Goddess... W-Wait, does that mean the holy sisters at church aren't God's wives, then...?=哦所以她是一位女神。。。等等，这是否意味着教堂里的神圣姐妹不是上帝的妻子，那么。。。？
She may often appear as female, but she's able to take many different forms, so I don't know if that's her true form.=她可能经常以女性的身份出现，但她能够采取许多不同的形式，所以我不知道这是否是她的真实形式。
*Chuckle* She can be mischievous, too. One time, she surprised me by transforming herself to look like me...=*笑吧，她也可能很淘气。有一次，她让我惊讶，她把自己变成了我的样子。。。
Wow... Really...?=哇！真正地
One day, God told us that the world would soon be filled with evil power and that monsters would run rampant. She even told us that the seal the previous holy knight put on the Darkfiend Dragon is on the verge of being broken...=有一天，上帝告诉我们，世界很快就会充满邪恶的力量，怪物会猖獗。她甚至告诉我们前一位神圣骑士戴在黑暗之龙上的封印即将被打破。。。
That's why she gave me the duty to look for the new savior - the one chosen to become a holy knight - and deliver the brooch to her, and accompany her in her quest to fight evil.=这就是为什么她让我有责任寻找新的救世主——被选为神圣骑士的救世主——并将胸针交给她，陪伴她与邪恶作斗争。
I see... So that's why you came to me...=我懂了。。。这就是你来找我的原因。。。
If I can accomplish my duty, God will continue to protect my village.=如果我能完成我的职责，上帝将继续保护我的村庄。
I want to protect my friends and family from wild animals, monsters...and humans...=我想保护我的朋友和家人不受野生动物和怪物的伤害。。。而人类。。。
Protect them...from humans...? What does that... Oh... The fairies in the freak shows at the capital...=保护他们。。。来自人类。。。？这意味着什么。。。哦首都怪物秀中的仙女们。。。
Tsk... It's not just that...=Tsk。。。不仅仅是。。。
We fairies are small and weak...and not all fairies are good at magic like me.=我们精灵又小又弱。。。并不是所有的仙女都像我一样擅长魔法。
It's only natural for other species to target us for magic and food. It's survival of the fittest, after all...=其他物种为了魔法和食物把我们作为目标是很自然的。毕竟，这是适者生存。。。
I hate them for it...but I understand why humans capture fairies to make a show out of them... But I don't get why humans and demi-humans...=我恨他们。。。但我明白为什么人类会抓住仙女来表演。。。但我不明白为什么人类和半人类。。。
Why do they break our limbs, strip us of our wings, and stab us with tree branches? How can they treat us like toys...?=为什么它们会折断我们的四肢，剥去我们的翅膀，用树枝刺伤我们？他们怎么能像对待玩具一样对待我们。。。？
I don't get it... Do they enjoy doing that? What have we ever done to your kind!?=我不明白。。。他们喜欢这样做吗？我们对你们做过什么！？
I... I don't...=我我不。。。
I know a fairy who had her stomach ripped by fingers from the inside... And another one who got ejaculated into so much she burst! Why can't they just simply kill us!? Why do they use us and then throw us away!?=我认识一个仙女，她的胃被里面的手指撕裂了。。。还有一个射精太多了，她就爆了！为什么他们不能直接杀了我们！？为什么他们利用我们然后把我们扔掉！？
What... Ejaculated...? That's...just cruel...=什么射精。。。？那是。。。太残忍了。。。
Cruel...? Of course it's cruel! All my brother did was go to his usual spot to pick some nuts...! To gather...what I asked him to get for me the day before...=残酷的当然很残忍！我哥哥所做的就是去他通常去的地方摘些坚果。。。！收集。。。前一天我让他给我买的东西。。。

Evil? So are you saying all the humans that approach my village are evil?=恶毒的你是说所有接近我村子的人都是邪恶的？

Are you sure? The other fairies have told me that among those cruel humans they've seen children much younger than you.=你确定吗？其他仙女告诉我，在那些残忍的人类中，他们见过比你小得多的孩子。
Ngh... No... I... No one... They don't want to be cruel... Those children...probably didn't know what they were doing...=嗯。。。不我没有人他们不想变得残忍。。。那些孩子。。。可能不知道他们在做什么。。。

I know... I know you're not like those humans. You're a special human who was chosen to be a holy knight...=我知道。。。我知道你不像那些人。你是一个被选为神圣骑士的特殊人类。。。

It seems that a different village in the north does trade with humans, and God insisted that only some humans are evil... Not that I'm ready to believe that...=似乎北方的另一个村庄与人类有贸易往来，上帝坚持认为只有一些人是邪恶的。。。并不是说我已经准备好相信。。。

Chapter 9    Writhing Sludge=第九章扭动污泥

For years, I've been training in the magical arts to get strong enough to avenge my comrades and get back at the humans who did terrible things to them... But you humans have short lives. If we leave you alone, you'll eventually die, anyway...=多年来，我一直在接受魔法艺术方面的训练，以变得足够强大，为我的同志报仇，并报复那些对他们做了可怕事情的人。。。但你们人类的寿命很短。如果我们不理你，你终究会死的，不管怎样。。。
To tell you the truth, I don't care what happens to humans. They're unjust, filthy creatures. I don't understand why God lends her power to your kind...=说实话，我不在乎人类会发生什么。他们是不公正、肮脏的生物。我不明白为什么上帝会把她的力量借给你们。。。
Still, this is the decision of the God who protects my village. I'll fulfill the duty she assigned me no matter what.=不过，这是保护我村庄的上帝的决定。不管发生什么事，我都要履行她指派给我的职责。
Monsters are another matter, of course, and we fairies are too small and weak to fight. Your kind prays to God as well, so it makes sense that she chose a human to save the world. It doesn't sit right with me personally, though...=当然，怪物是另一回事，而我们精灵太小太弱，无法战斗。你们也向上帝祈祷，所以她选择了一个人来拯救世界是有道理的。不过，我个人并不这么认为。。。
That's the reason I'm helping your kind.=这就是我帮助你们的原因。
I see...=我懂了。。。
I know that you're not the same as the humans who attacked my comrades... You must be a virtuous and pure person. Still, if you're going to fulfill your destiny as a holy knight, I need you to become stronger.=我知道你和袭击我同志的人不一样。。。你必须是一个善良纯洁的人。不过，如果你想完成你作为神圣骑士的使命，我需要你变得更强大。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Pure...huh...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>纯净的嗯……）
Judging by the way you speak, you must have grown up without struggle or hardship. You mentioned your parents are dead, so is it because of that female?=从你说话的方式来看，你一定是在没有挣扎或艰辛的环境下长大的。你说你父母死了，是因为那个女人吗？
Don't call her that... It's true that Miria took care of me, but I've had struggles in my life, too...=别这么叫她。。。没错，米丽亚照顾过我，但我的生活中也有挣扎。。。
Like...?=喜欢
Well... Um... I had to walk on dangerous mountain paths and risk tripping, and tending the general store can get boring... And I'm poor, so I only get hand-me-down clothes, and Miria wouldn't make tomato soup like I asked her to...=好嗯。。。我不得不走在危险的山路上，冒着被绊倒的风险，照看杂货店可能会变得无聊。。。我很穷，所以我只买旧衣服，而米莉亚不会像我要求的那样做番茄汤。。。
Stop. I've heard enough. *Sigh* Looks like I have to be even stricter with you. Good grief, why did God have to pick you?=停止我听够了*唉，看来我得对你更严格了。天哪，为什么上帝要选你？
You always run blindly ahead without listening to me. That's how you got stuck with that curse... You can't even appreciate the cooking I do for you...=你总是盲目地向前跑，不听我的话。这就是你被诅咒的原因。。。你甚至不能感激我为你做的菜。。。
I get that you're not used to fighting, but I still see hesitation in your sword swings. And yet, when I try to help you practice, you immediately get tired...=我知道你不习惯打架，但我仍然能看到你挥剑时的犹豫。然而，当我试着帮你练习的时候，你马上就累了。。。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Urk... I just wanted to get along with Iris, but I only made her mad at me... I shouldn't have talked to her...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>乌尔克。。。我只是想和你好好相处Iris, 但我只是让她生我的气。。。我不该和她说话……）
I've taught you how to purify crystals before, but you still can only make simple things, right?=我以前教过你如何净化水晶，但你仍然只能做简单的东西，对吗？
We can go over it again, so try to review what you learned yourself.=我们可以再复习一遍，所以试着复习一下你自己学到的东西。
O-Okay...=好吧。。。

The curse on my tummy tingles a little... What are the magic circles around here for?=我肚子上的诅咒有点刺痛...这里的魔法圈是干什么的？
They're teleportation circles... They're transferring magic from here to the room behind this door.=他们是传送圈...他们正在把魔法从这里转移到门后的房间。
The towers collect the magic sent from the Drain Crystals scattered across the land and then transfer the magic here.=塔楼收集了来自太阳的魔法黑暗水晶然后把魔法转移到这里。
If the circles are supplying the magic, would destroying them stop the gate from opening?=如果圆圈提供魔法，摧毁它们会阻止大门打开吗？
It would, but the teleportation circles themselves are maintained from the end sending the magic. If we want to destroy them, we have to do it from the other side.=是的，但是传送圈本身从传送魔法的最后一刻起就一直保持着。如果我们想摧毁他们，我们必须从另一边去做。
We can try and do that by teleporting to the other end, but we don't know what could be waiting for us there.=我们可以尝试通过传送到另一端来做到这一点，但我们不知道那里会有什么在等着我们。

Slimes...? Lamb...soup...? God... The day I saw the pillar of light... Ah... Aaah...=史莱姆s羔羊汤上帝那天我看到了光柱...啊...啊...
I know you haven't been able to sleep soundly since that day you killed your own kind at the quarry. You've been haunted by the guilt of killing humans, right?=我知道自从那天你在采石场杀了你自己的同类后，你一直睡不好。你一直被杀人的罪恶感困扰着，对吧？
*Sniff*... Th-That's not... *Sniff*...=*嗅嗅*...那不是*嗅嗅*...
You've been acting more cheerful since you took up fighting as a holy knight again, but that was just your way of suppressing the sense of guilt that kept swelling in your heart, wasn't it?=自从你成为一名拳击手以来，你表现得更快乐了圣骑士 再说一次，但那只是你抑制内心不断膨胀的内疚感的方式，不是吗？

There's no way you would be fine with killing another human being. You were just a simple village girl not so long ago...=你不可能再杀一个人了。不久前你只是一个普通的乡村女孩...
No matter how often you told yourself that you weren't at fault, the feelings of remorse were constantly chipping away at you...=无论你多么频繁地告诉自己你没有错，悔恨的感觉总是在不断地向你袭来...
I don't know the whole situation...but I'm assuming that Ricca, this delicate young girl, was almost assaulted and raped by men. Am I correct?=我不知道整个情况...但我想Ricca, 这个娇弱的年轻女孩几乎被男人袭击和强奸。我说得对吗？
Haha... Then I don't blame you for fighting back. It wasn't your fault...=哈哈...那我就不怪你反击了。这不是你的错...

I don't...have to fight anymore... I don't have to kill monsters...or people...or anyone...=我不...必须再打下去...我不需要杀怪物...或者人们...或者任何人...
Hehehe... That's right. If you stop being a holy knight, you'll never have to face life-threatening battles ever again...=嘿嘿...这是正确的。如果你不再是一个圣骑士, 你再也不用面对危及生命的战斗了...
We're just worried about you, Ricca... Even with divine powers, now that Master Archlich has the Darkfiend Dragon on his side, you'll die if you fight him...=我们只是担心你，Ricca... 即使拥有神圣的力量，现在大巫妖大师有了黑暗之龙在他身边，如果你和他战斗，你会死的...
But if you stay here, we can all peacefully live together... That's why...=但如果你留在这里，我们可以和平共处...这就是为什么...
That's why...you took the brooch from me...? Because you were...thinking about what's best for me...? You didn't want me to fight... To hurt anyone anymore...?=这就是为什么...你拿走了我的胸针...？因为你是...想想什么对我最好...？你不想让我打架...再伤害任何人...？

I feel bad for roping you into this in the first place... I don't want you to suffer anymore...=我一开始就为把你牵扯进来感到难过...我不想让你再受苦了...

Ah, aaaah... I... I want to be...with...everyone...=啊，啊...我我想成为...具有每个人

But I'm worried about her getting lost in a place like this... She said the wavelength from the monsters on this island were causing her pain, so she might be struggling right now...=但我担心她在这样的地方迷路...她说这个岛上怪物的波长造成了她的痛苦，所以她现在可能正在挣扎...

Hyahyahya! This bitch howls quite a bit. We are not puppets. We're helping him of our own accord to learn the secrets of necromancy.=嗨！这婊子嚎叫得厉害。我们不是木偶。我们自愿帮助他学习巫术的秘密。
I see... This wavelength of this girl's power is the same as that of God's previous dog, the one that destroyed us. But it seems that she's not even close to being as powerful as the last one... Hehehe!=我懂了...这个女孩力量的波长与上帝之前的狗的波长相同，那只狗摧毁了我们。但她似乎还没有上一个那么强大...嘿嘿！
I may be weaker than the last holy knight...but I'm much stronger than you monsters! You're just skin and bones! I'll beat you all in an instant!=我可能比上一个弱圣骑士...但我比你们这些怪物强多了！你只是皮包骨头！我马上就打败你们！
Hahaha, but she's just as lively... Oh, I've just thought of something good.=哈哈哈，但她也很活泼...哦，我刚想到一件好事。
Perhaps if we extract the holy essence from that girl we can make monsters that are immune to being hurt by God's power.=也许如果我们从那个女孩身上提取神圣的精髓，我们就能制造出不受上帝力量伤害的怪物。
Hahaha, what a great idea! We can create a monster that'll be much more powerful than that petrifying beast we worked so hard to rebuild. We can use it as our secret weapon against God and his lapdogs!=哈哈哈，好主意！我们可以创造一个比我们努力改造的石化野兽强大得多的怪物开发号. 我们可以用它作为对付上帝和他的走狗的秘密武器！
I'm always impressed by your wonderful ideas... In that case, let's capture the girl. After we completely drain her of her holy power, we can give her husk to the monsters to be their plaything.=你的好主意总是给我留下深刻印象...那样的话，我们就抓住那个女孩。在我们完全耗尽她的神圣力量后，我们可以把她的外壳交给怪物作为他们的玩物。
Hahahahaha! Minions, beat that bitch until she can no longer fight back!=哈哈哈！仆从们，打败那个婊子，直到她再也无法反击！
Hmph! Just try! I'm not going to be beaten by a bunch of skeletons!=嗯！试试看！我不会被一群骷髅打败的！

Okay, I just undid the soldiers' petrification, so we'll all head over to you. I think the soldiers over there have turned back to normal too, so please help them back to safety.=好了，我刚刚解开了士兵们的石化装置，所以我们都到你们那里去。我想那边的士兵也恢复了正常，所以请帮助他们回到安全的地方。
The soldiers over here? Okay, I'll do that.=这里的士兵？好的，我会的。

I was ensnared by numerous black tentacles, in a corridor somewhere in Archlich's castle.=我在阿奇Ricca城堡的某个走廊里，被无数的黑色触手困住了。
Eeek... Augh, nngh...!=哎呀...啊，啊...！
There was a dull pain in my lower body.=我的下半身隐隐作痛。
That pain was more than enough to bring me to the realization that the tentacles created by the wisp had deflowered me.=这种痛苦足以让我意识到，这缕烟所产生的触手已经让我失去了知觉。
Mwahahaha, I made the holy fairy, the messenger of God, into my woman! Are you vexed? You are, aren't you?! Mwahaha!=哈哈哈，我把上帝的使者神圣的仙女变成了我的女人！你生气了吗？你是吗？！姆瓦哈！
Ngh... Tsk... I-I'm not bothered at all...! Eek... Aaagh, urk, stop it...!=嗯...Tsk...我一点也不介意...！哎呀...啊，乌尔克，住手...！
The spirit before me, a wisp, was a monster born of a vengeful human spirit infused with magic, similar to a wraith.=我面前的精灵是一缕微光，是一个由充满魔法的复仇精神所生的怪物，类似于幽灵。
They are usually lesser spirits that can do nothing but roam their territory but the wisp that had captured me was smarter and had stronger magic than other monsters, like the skeleton warriors from the port town.=它们通常都是些小精灵，只能在自己的领地上游荡，但捕获我的那一缕精灵比其他怪物更聪明，拥有更强的魔法，比如来自港口城镇的骷髅战士。
I'm already halfway inside. Not long ago, I couldn't even touch you directly, but now I'm able to rape your pussy that's teeming with magic. Looks like you've grown pretty weak!=我已经进去一半了。不久前，我甚至不能直接触摸你，但现在我可以强奸你充满魔力的阴部。看起来你已经很虚弱了！
Uugh... If only I was in top shape... I wouldn't have gotten caught by a lowly monster like you...=啊...要是我身材好就好了...我不会被你这样卑微的怪物抓住...
Normally, my body would be cloaked in the same magic generated by the holy knight's brooch, meaning that low-level monsters wouldn't even be able to touch me.=通常情况下，我的身体也会被同样的魔法所掩盖圣骑士'它的胸针，意味着低级怪物甚至不能碰我。
However, I hadn't been feeling well because of all the magic being released by the monsters in the castle, and I was further weakened after being caught by the wisp and being assaulted by its tentacles wreathed in evil magic.=然而，我一直感觉不太好，因为城堡里的怪物释放了所有的魔法，在被那缕魔杖抓住并被它缠绕在邪恶魔法中的触手攻击后，我变得更加虚弱。
You're pretty powerful for your size, as I might expect of a messenger of God. Mwahaha, you're the perfect candidate to be my new body!=就你的身材而言，你是相当强大的，正如我对神的使者所期待的那样。姆瓦哈，你是我新身体的完美人选！
(<indent%3D0.4em>Urk... This guy... So he is trying to take over my body... No wonder he hasn't killed me yet. He's just teasing me...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>呜... 这家伙...所以他试图接管我的身体...难怪他还没杀我。他只是在逗我……）
Judging from the way it acts, this wisp is probably what became of the lich necromancer who used to live in this castle.=从它的行为方式来看，这一缕可能是曾经住在这座城堡里的巫妖亡灵巫师的遗骸。
Failing to become immortal, its flesh had rotted away leaving behind a being being made up of only a soul and magic energy.=由于未能长生不老，它的肉体已经腐烂，只留下一个由灵魂和魔法能量组成的存在。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Damn it... This is so annoying... I have to find the girl and stop Archlich as soon as possible...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>该死的...这太烦人了...我必须找到那个女孩，尽快阻止阿奇Ricca……）
Mwahaha! Mwahahahahaha!=姆瓦哈！哈哈哈！
(<indent%3D0.4em>Still... Ngh... Oww, it hurts... I didn't think getting deflowered would hurt this bad... I can't believe this good-for-nothing monster did this to me... The girl...she endured this same pain at the hands of the goblins...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>还嗯...哦，很疼...我没想到被降下会这么疼...我不敢相信这个毫无用处的怪物对我这么做...那个女孩...她在哥布林的手中忍受着同样的痛苦……）

Succeed at guarding with perfect timing to knock back the attacking enemy. Not effective against certain enemies.\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\nSkill level: Current Lv.1/Max Lv.1=在最佳时机成功防守，击退进攻的敌人。对某些敌人无效。\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\n技能等级：当前Lv.1/最大Lv.1
Damn it, to think that the monsters would attack as a group...! We're done for...!=该死，想到怪物会集体攻击...！我们受够了...！
Stop griping! We're going to protect the town and its people!=别抱怨了！我们要保护这座城市和它的人民！
We're being pushed back... We need to at least buy enough time for the townspeople to escape...=我们被推回...我们至少需要为镇上的人争取足够的时间逃跑...
Damn it...! If only the knight of God or whatever was here...=该死的...！要是上帝的骑士或其他什么人在这里就好了...
What's happening...?! The monsters are dying...?!=发生了什么...？！怪物们快死了...？！
That's...! A magic sword...?=那是...！一把神奇的剑...？
You evil monsters...! I'm here to put a stop to this!=你们这些邪恶的怪物...！我是来阻止这一切的！
An ally...? Who is it...?!=盟友...？是谁...？！
With the glimmer of the sun in my heart...I defeat the monsters who emerge from darkness...=带着我心中的阳光...我打败了从黑暗中出现的怪物...
The messenger of sunlight, Holy Knight Ricca, has come!=阳光的使者，神圣的骑士Ricca, 来了！
The knight...of God?! The one that's been rumored to have been destroying monsters' nests...? So she really does exist...! W-We're saved...!=骑士...天哪？！那个据传一直在摧毁怪物巢穴的人...？所以她真的存在...！我们得救了...！
B-But... Huh...? She just looks like a normal girl... Can we really depend on her...?=但是...呵呵...？她只是看起来像个正常的女孩...我们真的能依靠她吗...？
Soldiers! I came to help you!=士兵！我是来帮你的！
That magic sword did defeat those monsters... We've no choice but to trust her for now!=那把魔剑打败了那些怪物...我们别无选择，只能暂时信任她！
Here I go...! Hyaaah!=我来了...！嗨！
Thanks for your assistance...! But really...a girl like this...=谢谢你的帮助...！但真的...像这样的女孩...
Don't worry, I'll save you all!=别担心，我会救你们的！
Understood! Thank you very much!=理解！非常感谢你！
Several of my subordinates have life crystals on hand. If you feel like you're in trouble, go near the soldiers that aren't fighting any enemies, and they'll heal you!=我的几个下属手头有生命水晶。如果你觉得自己有麻烦了，走近那些没有与敌人作战的士兵，他们会治愈你的！
So, uh... Why did you talk like you were performing in a play just now? You even climbed up to that high spot for it...=所以，呃...你刚才为什么说得像在演戏一样？你甚至爬到了那个高点...
Huh...? I wanted to cheer up the soldiers, so...=呵呵...？我想让士兵们振作起来，所以...
A long time ago, Miria and I saw a play put on by a traveling entertainer. The hero from that story always made his grand entrance from up high.=很久以前，Miria 我还看了一个旅行艺人上演的戏剧。那个故事中的英雄总是从高处登场。
Hmph. Is that so...=嗯。是这样吗...
The settlement at the foot of the mountains... The towns ruined by monsters... The settlements attacked by orcs... The mountain village in the west...=山脚下的定居点...被怪物摧毁的城镇...被兽人袭击的定居点...西部的山村...
I don't want anywhere else to end up like those places... I swear I'm going to protect this port town!=我不想让其他地方变成那样...我发誓我会保护这个港口城市！
Monsters are on the roof, too...!=屋顶上也有怪物...！
There's a ladder ahead. Use it to climb up to the roof!=前面有梯子。用它爬上屋顶！
*Snooooort!* I was thinking about going to find you to get my revenge, and now I find you here! You bratty bitch!=*Snooooort！*我想去找你报仇，现在我在这里找到你了！你这个臭婊子！
You're the orc that attacked Claret's house!=你就是袭击我的兽人Claret'他家！
I thought you would've learned your lesson by now... You're surprisingly resilient...=我以为你现在已经吸取了教训...你惊人地有韧性...
Looks like the skinny brat ain't with you today! *Snooort!* It's 3 on 1 this time! We're gonna beat your ass black and blue, and then shame you in front of the humans until you beg for death!=看来那个瘦小的小子今天没跟你在一起*斯努特！*这次是3对1！我们要把你的屁股打得青一块紫一块，然后在人类面前羞辱你，直到你乞求死亡！
Not only did you attack Claret's house, you attacked the town, too...! I'm not letting you get away again!=你不仅袭击了Claret's的房子，你也袭击了这个镇...！我不会再让你逃跑了！
*Snooort!* Shut up, bratty bitch! You're gonna be dealing with me for the rest of your life! *Snoooort!*=*斯努特！*闭嘴，臭婊子！你这辈子都要和我打交道*斯努奥特*
Upon grapple defeat by Orc\r\n"The orc's pregnant bride" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=在被兽人击败后\n“兽人怀孕的新娘”\nH场景（已经看过）
*Snort...!* Damn it, I want power! Just enough power to pin down this brat one more time...! *Snort...!*=*哼…！*该死，我要权力！只是足够的力量再把这小子制服一次*哼*
This is the end... I'm going to finish you off.=这就是结局...我要干掉你。
D-Damn it! No way I'm gonna die, you bitch...! I'm gonna get my revenge for sure...! *Snoooort!*=该死！我不会死的，你这个婊子...！我一定会报仇的*斯努奥特*
Gyah...! He escaped into the sea...!?=啊...！他逃到海里了...！？
Damn persistent orc... But I don't think he'll last very long with those scars. He'll probably drown and die soon.=该死的兽人...但我认为他留着这些伤疤活不了多久。他可能很快就会淹死。
Yeah... Let's hurry on!=是 啊我们快点！
The houses over there have lots of monsters on their roofs, too... How do we get there...?=那边的房子屋顶上也有很多怪物...我们怎么去那里...？
How about jumping on the windmill blades? If you time it just right with their rotations, you should be able to hop across one after another.=在风车叶片上跳跃怎么样？如果你的时间正好与他们的旋转同步，你应该能够一个接一个地跳过去。
The ships anchored to the harbor are on fire...=停泊在港口的船只着火了...
Those ships are important to the townspeople... We have to protect them!=那些船对镇上的人很重要...我们必须保护他们！
Use "Life Crystal"?=使用“生命水晶”？
HP has been fully restored=HP已经完全恢复
Use "Armor Repair Crystal"?=使用“护甲修复水晶”？
The durability level of Ricca's armor has been restored=耐久性水平Ricca'他的盔甲已经修复
This is a direct order from Master Archlich! Destroy the boats so that they can no longer be used! Destroy them! Destroy them!!!=这是阿奇Ricca大师的直接命令！摧毁船只，使其不再被使用！摧毁他们！摧毁他们！！！
Oh no you don't!=你不知道哦不！
Looks like the monsters' main goal is to destroy the ships...=看起来怪物的主要目标是摧毁船只...
Who are you?!=你是谁？！
I'm Ricca! I'm God's knight, who came to save this town!=我是Ricca! 我是上帝的骑士，是来拯救这座城市的！
I had heard that there was someone who was getting in our way, but... There's no way it's a girl that dresses in a shameless manner like you!=我听说有人挡了我们的路，但是...不可能是一个像你这样穿着无耻的女孩！
Ah, I see... Showing up for battle while flaunting those captivating thighs in such a revealing way... You're trying to seduce us, aren't you?! Are you a slut?!=啊，我明白了...展现在战场上，同时以如此暴露的方式炫耀迷人的大腿...你想勾引我们，不是吗？！你是荡妇吗？！
Wha... Sh-Shut up! I am not a slut... It's not like I want to flaunt my thighs, either!=什么...闭嘴！我不是荡妇...我也不想炫耀我的大腿！
Besides, you're the ones who are naked! We can see everything, including your bones...! You, uh... P-Pervert skeletons!=而且，你才是赤身裸体的人！我们可以看到一切，包括你的骨头...！你，呃...变态骷髅！
Hmph! You dare to call we warriors pervert skeletons...? You think a slutty brat like you can defeat us, the elite soldiers that Master Archlich himself created?=嗯！你敢说我们战士是变态骷髅...？你以为像你这样放荡的小鬼能打败我们，阿奇Ricca大师亲手创造的精英士兵吗？
We'll strip you naked like the slut you are and expose you in front of the humans!=我们会脱光你的衣服，像荡妇一样，把你暴露在人类面前！
What... Strip me naked...!? Y-You really are pervert skeletons... Ugh, Iris, what do I do!?=什么脱光我的衣服...！？你真是变态的骷髅...呃，Iris, 我该怎么办！？
These guys must have some kind of grudge against the holy knight. Let's grind them into dust and feed them to the fishes!=这些人肯定对这件事怀恨在心圣骑士. 让我们把它们磨成尘土，喂给鱼吃吧！
Upon defeat by Skeleton Warrior\r\n"Abused in the port town" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=在被骷髅战士击败后\n“在港口镇被虐待”\nH场景（已经看过）
Look at those big shields and long spears... With proper equipment like that, I guess they really are Archlich's best soldiers.=看看那些大盾牌和长矛...有了这样合适的装备，我想他们真的是阿奇Ricca最好的士兵。
Don't try to jump over them, or they'll knock you down with their long spears. Close combat might be the best strategy here.=不要试图跳过他们，否则他们会用长矛把你打倒。近战可能是这里最好的策略。
What!? There's more of them!?=什么还有更多！？
You call yourselves elite warriors? Hiding in the shadows is such a cheap trick.=你们自称精英战士？躲在阴影里是个很便宜的把戏。
Just one more! You can do it!=再来一次！你能行！
Yeaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!! We did it! We drove away the monsters!=是啊！！！我们做到了！我们赶走了怪物！
Ah, I thought we were done for... That knight girl saved us...!=啊，我以为我们完了...那个骑士女孩救了我们...！
Miss Knight... Your name is Ricca, correct? You really helped us out, thank you.=奈特小姐...你的名字是Ricca, 对的你真的帮了我们，谢谢。
It's no problem. I'm just fulfilling my duty as a holy knight... I'm glad that the townspeople are safe...!=没问题。我只是在履行我的职责圣骑士... 我很高兴镇上的人都安全了...！
Um... You've been calling yourself a messenger of God...a holy knight, but... Is that really true...?=嗯...你一直称自己是上帝的使者...A.圣骑士, 但是这是真的吗...？
W-Well... I'm, uh... I used to help out at the church in the west mountain village, and one day I received a message from God telling me to save those in trouble...=嗯...我...我曾经在西山村的教堂帮忙，有一天我收到上帝的信息，告诉我要拯救那些有困难的人...
Huh...? Oh, it's Claret.=呵呵...？哦，是的Claret.
Huff, huff... Ricca! You drove back the monsters that attacked the town! You're amazi... Ah!=哈夫，哈夫...Ricca! 你击退了袭击城镇的怪物！你是亚马逊...啊！
Huh? What's wrong, Claret? You look so surprised... And the soldiers do, too...=嗯？怎么了，Claret? 你看起来很惊讶...士兵们也一样...
Ricca... B-Behind...!=Ricca... 落后...！
Huh...? Behind...? Oh, Claret... Don't talk about my behind in front of the soldiers. It's embarrassing!=呵呵...？在…的后面哦Claret... 不要在士兵面前谈论我的背后。太尴尬了！
Not your behind! Behind you! Oh... How could he...!?=不是你的背后！在你身后！哦他怎么能...！？
Hey... Iris... Don't come out now. There are people around...=嘿Iris... 现在不要出来。周围有人...
The island on the other side... Why is the sky bright red...!? And what is that castle...? It wasn't there before...=另一边的岛...为什么天空是鲜红色的...！？那城堡是什么...？它以前不在那里...
I can sense the magic from the earth...gathering at the top of the tower... It's so immense, I can feel it even from here...=我能感觉到来自地球的魔力...聚集在塔顶...这是如此巨大，我甚至可以从这里感觉到...
The Drain Crystals scattered across the land must've been sending their magic to that spot... That has to be...Archlich's base...!=这个黑暗水晶分散在陆地上的人一定把他们的魔法传送到了那个地方...那一定是...阿奇Ricca的基地...！
Archlich's castle... What is he planning to do with all that magic energy?=阿奇Ricca城堡...他打算用这些神奇的能量做什么？
He's going to resurrect...the Darkfiend Dragon!=他要复活了...黑暗的龙！
She's the one who rescued us from the arachne...! Captain, please believe her...!=是她把我们从蜘蛛网救出来的...！队长，请相信她...！
I know... It's hard to believe, but that power... And how can I doubt it when I see this fairy right in front of me...=我知道...很难相信，但是那种力量...当我看到这个仙女就在我面前时，我怎么能怀疑呢...
Ugh... I'm not some freak show attraction... Don't stare at me like that...=呃...我不是什么吸引人的怪胎...别那样盯着我看...
Iris... Please be patient with them...=Iris... 请耐心对待他们...
(<indent%3D0.4em>Hmm... She's small, but they're large...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>嗯... 她很小，但它们很大……）
He's going to use the magic from the earth he gathered through the Drain Crystals to open a gate... A gate that'll lead to the World of Darkness.=他将使用从地球上收集的魔法黑暗水晶让我们打开一扇门...通往黑暗世界的大门。
Once the gate is large enough, it'll connect to the World of Darkness, and the Darkfiend Dragon will be released from the prison the previous holy knight sealed him in...=一旦大门足够大，它将连接到黑暗世界，黑暗之龙将在前一天从监狱中释放圣骑士 把他关在...
So that's Archlich's plan... Releasing a creature from another realm sounds like something out of a fairy tale, but it may be possible with all that magic...=这就是Archlich的计划...从另一个领域释放一个生物听起来像是童话故事中的故事，但这一切都有可能发生...
God had already told me about Archlich plans, but I had no idea exactly how he was going to bring back the Darkfiend Dragon...=上帝已经告诉了我阿奇Ricca的计划，但我不知道他会怎样把黑暗的龙带回来...
But where did that castle come from? It just appeared out of nowhere. Shouldn't he have continued his plans in secret...?=但那座城堡是从哪里来的？它不知从哪里冒出来。他不应该秘密地继续他的计划吗...？
We've been going around destroying Drain Crystals, so he wasn't able to maintain the magic to hide the castle. Either that, or...=我们一直在四处破坏黑暗水晶s、 所以他无法维持隐藏城堡的魔法。要么那样，要么...
He no longer has the need...to hide it...=他不再需要...要隐藏它...
W-Wait... Are you saying that he's close to resurrecting the Darkfiend Dragon...!?=等等...你是说他马上就要复活黑龙了...！？
It's only a possibility...but it's safer to assume so.=这只是一种可能性...但更安全的假设是这样的。
But if the Darkfiend Dragon is resurrected, won't it ruin even more towns and villages!?=但是如果黑暗之龙复活了，它不会毁掉更多的城镇和村庄吗！？
It won't be just towns and villages. God said that once the Darkfiend Dragon comes back to our realm, it's going to devour all living things in this world...including my hometown and the creatures of other continents...=不仅仅是城镇和村庄。上帝说，一旦黑暗之龙回到我们的王国，它将吞噬这个世界上所有的生物...包括我的家乡和其他大陆的生物...
Let's go to that island and stop Archlich!=我们去那个岛阻止阿奇Ricca！
Yes... We have to... That's our mission from God, after all!=对我们必须...这毕竟是上帝赋予我们的使命！
Ricca... Iris...!=Ricca... Iris...!
Um, Captain? May we borrow a ship from the port?=队长？我们可以从港口借一艘船吗？
I'm sorry, but that's not possible. Currently, you can't take a boat out to sea.=对不起，但那是不可能的。目前，你不能乘船出海。
What...? Why...?=什么为什么？
There's a large cave at the bottom of the ocean located between this port town and that island. There's a monster called Poseidon living there, and it sinks boats.=在这个港口城镇和那个岛之间的海底有一个大洞穴。那里住着一个叫波塞冬的怪物，它会把船弄沉。
Poseidon...? Isn't that the old sea god that resides in the waters around here...?=波塞冬...？那不是住在附近水域的老海神吗...？
That's right. Poseidon almost never appeared in front of humans. However, he's been spotted more frequently over the past year. He's been attacking boats.=这是正确的。波塞冬几乎从未出现在人类面前。然而，在过去的一年里，他被发现的频率更高。他一直在攻击船只。
Because of Poseidon, many of the merchant ships that used to sail around here have been sunk... Apparently, the sea god is protecting that island...=因为波塞冬，许多曾经在这里航行的商船都沉没了...显然，海神在保护那个岛...
That island was rumored to host a large nest of monsters, so a couple months ago, the capital's fleet headed over to investigate.=据传那个岛上有一个巨大的怪物巢穴，所以几个月前，首都的舰队前往调查。
Poseidon sank half of the ships that headed towards that island. The boats were snapped in half by snake-like arms that wrapped around them.=波塞冬击沉了一半驶向该岛的船只。船被缠绕在船上的蛇形手臂一分为二。
The soldiers that managed to reach the island weren't even able to conduct a proper investigation, and most of them perished on the way back...=成功抵达该岛的士兵甚至无法进行适当的调查，他们中的大多数人在返回途中丧生...
So I'm sorry, but we can't have any boats going out to sea. We'll just be sending you and our sailors to their deaths...=很抱歉，我们不能让船出海。我们只会送你和我们的水手去死...
I see... So you're telling me...if we get rid of this sea god, you'll let us borrow a ship?=我懂了...你是说...如果我们除掉这个海神，你会让我们借一艘船吗？
Huh? Yes... Do you have some idea on how to get rid of Poseidon, Miss Ricca...?=嗯？对小姐，你知道怎么摆脱波塞冬吗Ricca...?
I'm...going to go defeat Poseidon! Don't worry, I've fought against a village's guardian dragon before, too!=我是去打败波塞冬！别担心，我以前也和一个村子的守护龙作战过！
*Sigh* Were you listening to what the captain was saying at all?=*唉* 你到底在听队长说什么吗？
The sea god lives in a cave at the bottom of the sea. How do you plan to get there?=海神住在海底的一个洞穴里。你打算怎么去那里？
Huh...? Well... I was hoping you'd have some sort of magic spell, Iris...=呵呵...？好我希望你能施点魔法，Iris...
I don't have anything like that! I've always known you were stupid and short-sighted, but I swear you've gotten even dumber lately!=我没有这样的东西！我一直知道你很愚蠢，目光短浅，但我发誓你最近变得更蠢了！
What...!? Iris! So you do think I'm stupid! You can be pretty hurtful sometimes...=什么Iris! 所以你认为我很愚蠢！有时候你会很伤人次...
Don't get carried away just because you've gotten a little stronger. I'm glad you're feeling better, but I can't have you fooling around when the Darkfiend Dragon is about to be resurrected...=不要因为你变得更强壮了就得意忘形。我很高兴你感觉好多了，但我不能让你在黑暗之龙即将复活的时候鬼混...
Um... Miss Ricca... We can send word to the capital, and have them send a ship as a diversion...=嗯...未击中Ricca... 我们可以向首都发送消息，让他们派一艘船转移注意力...
You want to get to the cave at the bottom of the sea, right...?=你想去海底的洞穴，对吗...？
Claret...?=Claret...?
Leave it to me... I have an idea!=交给我吧...我有个主意！
Chapter 17    A Legend Resurrected=第 1.章7.传奇不灭

Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 13 Raging Downpour?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第13章倾盆大厦？
Storming Grasslands=猛烈的草原
Ricca... Go...save...the people...of this...world...=Ricca......去......拯救......人......这个......世界......
(<indent%3D0.4em>I can't do it... I just can't... I even...ran away from my duty...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我不能这样做......我不能......我甚至......远离我的职责......）
(<indent%3D0.4em>What...should I do now...?)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我现在该怎么办...？）
Rain...=雨...
I should go back to the cave...and take shelter...=我应该回到洞穴......避难所......
(<indent%3D0.4em>No... Iris is still at the cave... I can't go back...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>不......Iris还在山洞里......我不能回去......）

Wow, it matches the blue ribbon I always wear! Wait...this ribbon looks hard. It's not cute at all...=哇，它和我一直戴的蓝丝带很相配！等待这条丝带看起来很硬。一点都不可爱...
Would you quit complaining? Anyway, I'm glad the golem body is working just fine.=你能停止抱怨吗？不管怎样，我很高兴傀儡的身体工作得很好。
Heehee, and it was my first time making the core! I really am amazing...=嘿嘿，这是我第一次做核心！我真的很了不起...
You're absolutely sure I'll return to my body, right?=你绝对确定我会回到我的身体，对吗？
Huh? What are you looking around for?=嗯？你在找什么？
This feeling... Monsters are gathering around us. Looks like we took too long. We better destroy that gate soon.=这种感觉...怪物正在我们周围聚集。看来我们花的时间太长了。我们最好尽快摧毁那扇门。
O-Okay...but...I can't leave my body laying down there! The monsters might do things to it...!=好吧...但是我不能让我的身体躺在那里！怪物可能会对它做些什么...！
Don't worry, I'll watch over it. Now hurry and destroy the castle gate before any powerful monsters get here. After you take down the gate, you can break the core yourself and return to your body.=我不会担心的。现在赶快在任何强大的怪物到来之前摧毁城堡之门。取下闸门后，你可以自己打破核心，回到身体。
Ugh, okay... I'll go destroy the gate.=好吧...我去摧毁大门。
Good. You should be able to beat any monsters that come at your way with that body.=好的你应该能够打败任何带着那具尸体向你走来的怪物。
Castle Gate=城堡门
Mission : Destroy the Castle Gate before Iris is defeated=任务：提前摧毁城堡大门Iris 战败
Alright. I kinda feel sorry for them since I'm so much bigger, but...I can't show any mercy to Archlich's minions!=好吧我有点为他们感到难过，因为我比他们大很多，但是...我不能怜悯任何巫妖爪牙！
Upon defeat\r\n"Ricca's aerial insemination" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=战败时\n"Ricca'“空中授精”\nH场景（已经看过）
Monsters are gathering here, too...=怪兽也聚集在这里...
Iris, did you say that there are monsters near my body!? I'm coming back! I just have to break the gem on my chest, right!?=Iris, 你是说我的身体附近有怪物吗！？我要回来了！我只需要把胸前的宝石打碎，对吧！？
Don't worry, I can handle these monsters and buy you some time. You focus on destroying the gate as soon as possible!=别担心，我能对付这些怪物，给你争取时间。你要集中精力尽快摧毁大门！
Ugh... I may have used too much power making the golem core. I only have about half of my magic energy left... I need to make it last until the gate is broken!=呃...我可能在制作傀儡核心时使用了太多的能量。我只剩下一半的魔法能量了...我要让它一直持续到大门被打破！
I'm at the gate! Time to destroy it so I can go back to my body!=我在门口！是时候摧毁它了，这样我才能回到我的身体！
Huff, huff... I'm not going to let these monsters...touch her body...=哈夫，哈夫...我不会让这些怪物...触摸她的身体...
The gate broke! Iris, I'm coming back! I just have to break the crystal on my chest, right?=门坏了！Iris, 我要回来了！我得把胸前的水晶打碎，对吗？
That's right! I strengthened the core, so you need to use something hard to crack it!=这是正确的！我加强了核心，所以你需要用一些难破解的东西！
I've strengthened the core crystal with magic, so it shouldn't break under those monsters' attacks. Still, you'll flinch if you take too much damage, so keep your guard up.=我用魔法强化了核心水晶，所以它不会在那些怪物的攻击下破裂。尽管如此，如果你受到太多的伤害，你还是会退缩，所以要保持警惕。
Those monsters recognize that you and your golem body are an enemy.=这些怪物认识到你和你的傀儡身体是敌人。
So many monsters... When did they get here...?=这么多怪物...他们什么时候到的...？
It's great to be back in my own body! I feel so much lighter.=回到我自己的身体真是太好了！我感觉轻松多了。
So this is Archlich's castle...=这就是阿奇Ricca的城堡...
...ca...! Ri...cca...!=...ca...！里...cca...！
Oh! I think Claret is trying to contact me. We're close enough to each other for the crystal balls to connect.=哦我想Claret 正在联系我。我们彼此足够近，水晶球可以连接。
Our ship is about the arrive on the island.=我们的船快到岛上了。
Please be careful, Ricca... If anything happened to you, I would...=请小心，Ricca... 如果你出了什么事，我会...
He did? Heehee, that's reassuring. I'll be going a bit further, then.=是吗？嘿嘿，这让人放心。那我就更进一步了。
Yes, of course. Oh, by the way, the captain of the soldiers sent people to the other towns and even the royal capital to ask for reinforcements before we set sail.=当然可以。哦，顺便说一句，在我们启航之前，士兵们的队长派人去了其他城镇，甚至皇家首都请求增援。
I'll be fine!=我会没事的！
That's good to hear. Please be careful.=很高兴听到你这么说。请小心。
You're the ones who should be careful. I found a lot of petrified soldiers, so watch out for any dangerous monsters lurking around when you get to the island.=你才是应该小心的人。我发现了很多石化的士兵，所以当你到达岛上时，要小心周围潜伏的危险怪物。
The petrification...monster...=石化...怪物

Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 12 The Depths of Darkness?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第12章黑暗的深处？
Mining Cave=矿山洞穴
I can feel a massive flow of magic energy from inside that cave... That demon woman's magic is coming from deep in there, too...=我可以感受到那个洞穴里面的魔法能量巨大流动......恶魔女人的魔法也来自于那里的深处......
Miria... Oww...Ugh... My tummy...=miria ... oww ...呃......我的肚子......
I resealed the succubus' curse, but that woman's energy must be activating it... Stay still, and I'll strengthen the seal.=我重新保持了狂欢的诅咒，但那个女人的能量必须激活它......保持静止，我会加强密封。
Nnngh... I'm okay. I feel a little feverish, but I can handle it. I can still fight.=nnngh ...我没事。\n我觉得有点发烧，但我可以处理它。\n我仍然可以打架。
Oh, okay...?=哦好的...？
No directional input: Lightning Rush=没有方向输入：闪电浪涌
Tap button: Sword Throw=点按按钮：剑投掷
Miria... How did you end up like that...?=miria ......你是怎么回事的......？
Is that a cart for carrying stone? It's not too rusted... It might still move.=那是携带石头的推车吗？\n它不是太生锈了......它可能仍然可以移动。
Hell beetles? Even in a cave like this?=地狱甲虫？\n甚至在像这样的洞穴中？
Those bugs emit electricity. If you attack them while they're discharging, you're going to get electrocuted.=那些虫子发电。\n如果在他们放电的时候攻击它们，你会被触电。
Electricity... You mean lightning power? I might go numb if I touch them...=电力......你的意思是闪电力量？\n如果我触摸它们，我可能会麻木......
Exactly. If you do get electrocuted, you'll lose your ability to move for a moment.=确切地。\n如果你确实触电，你将失去你移动一会儿的能力。
It must be like the magic Miria used... Her lightning made my head flash and my whole body feel like it was on fire. It hurt so much...=它必须像魔法Miria使用......她的闪电让我的头闪光灯，我的整个身体都感到像火着火了。\n它伤害了这么多......
There you go whining again... It's true that she uses strong lightning magic, but you're protected by divine power. You should be able to endure it.=在那里，你再次抱怨......确实，她使用强大的闪电魔法，但你受到神圣力量的保护。\n你应该能够忍受它。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Easy for you to say... Getting struck by that lightning hurt so so much. I couldn't even think because of the pain...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>容易说......被那个闪电击中这么多。\n我甚至不能因为痛苦而思考......）
The earth's magic energy is gushing out from the ground... No wonder monsters live here.=地球的魔力从地面涌出......没有奇迹怪物住在这里。

You can ride that flow of magic and rise up into the air.=您可以骑魔法流动并升入空中。
Upon grapple defeat by Roper\r\n"Caught by a roper" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=在骑骑兵的擒抱失败\r\n“被绳索抓住”\r\nH场景（已经看到）
Eeep, wh-what is this...? It's squirmy... It sort of looks like the sea anemone I saw in the encyclopedia...=Eeep，wh-这是什么......？\n这是squirmy ......它看起来像是我在百科全书中看到的海葵......
That's a roper. They use their long tentacles to capture approaching prey. You better get out of their grasp as fast as you can if you get caught by them. Otherwise, they'll eat you up.=那是一个绳索。\n他们用他们的长触手来捕获接近的猎物。\n如果你被他们抓住，你最好尽快摆脱他们的掌握。\n否则，他们会吃掉你。
Ugh, looking at them for too long makes me sick...=呃，看着他们太久让我生病了......
A big waterwheel... I think I can hop onto one of the blades...=一个大的水车......我想我可以跳到其中一个刀片......
That thing is huge... These mines must have been pretty busy before the monsters took over... Now it's a mere shadow of its former self.=那件事是巨大的......在怪物接管之前，这些地雷一定很忙......现在它只是其前自我的阴影。
MP has been fully restored=MP已完全恢复
I can sense the waves from a Drain Crystal in this direction... As well as that woman's magic...=我可以在这个方向上感受到黑暗水的波浪......以及那个女人的魔法......
Miria... I can finally see her again...=Miria ......我终于可以再次见到她......
I can't believe my gentle sister was turned into a monster... I promise I'm going to turn you back to normal, Miria...=我不敢相信我的温柔姐姐被转变为一个怪物......我保证我会把你送回正常，miria ...
There! It's her!=那里！\n是她！
Oh my, you finally came... Heehee... So I see you haven't abandoned her yet, Miss Fairy...=哦，我，你终于来了...... heehee ...所以我看到你还没有放弃她，仙女小姐......
You must be very faithful to your God... And a good friends to Ricca, too...=你必须非常忠诚于你的上帝......还有一个好朋友，也是......
Hold on. That woman probably has something up her sleeve, just like she did at the goblin fortress.=坚持，稍等。\n那个女人可能有一些袖子，就像她在妖精堡垒所做的那样。
Oh, Miss Fairy! You ruined the surprise! Now I can't use the thing I had planned... So sad...=哦，仙女小姐！\n你毁了惊喜！\n现在我不能用我计划的东西......这么伤心......
Heehee... Looks like your fairy friend doesn't like me very much... Whatever. Buzzing insects are of little concern to me...=heehee ...看起来你的童话朋友不喜欢我......无论如何。\n嗡嗡的昆虫对我来说很少见......
You know, Ricca... I've very happy that you came to see me. I thought I would have to go pick you up myself. You're still a spoiled child, I see... *Giggle*=你知道，Ricca......我很高兴你来看我。\n我以为我要去自己接你。\n你仍然是一个被宠坏的孩子，我明白了... *傻笑*
Look at this ring... Isn't it cute? I made it out of the red gem from that necklace you gave me, since the original wirework was broken by the goblins.=看看这个戒指......不是可爱吗？\n我从那个项链中取出了红色宝石，因为原来的钢丝制品被妖精打破了。
This light crimson crystal isn't worth very much...but it made me so happy. It was a gift from you, after all...=这款灯火Crimson Crystal非常值得......但它让我很开心。\n毕竟，这是你的礼物......
Heehee... Ricca, do you know what humans call this kind of gem?=Heehee ......Ricca，你知道人类称这种宝石吗？
This gem...is called a succubus crystal.=这个宝石...被称为魅富水晶。
The pink hue symbolizes the color of a woman's privates. It's said that succubi love to wear this to tempt human men. Don't you think it's the perfect accessory for me? *Chuckle*=粉红色的色调象征着女人私有的颜色。\n据说员汇喜欢穿这个来诱惑人类。\n难道你认为这是我的完美配饰吗？ *笑声*
How vulgar. Sounds like something a human would come up with.=如何粗俗。\n听起来像是一个人会想出的东西。
How could...the store merchant...give that to me...?=怎么可能...商店商家......给我......？
Heehee... That's right. That gentleman was the one who gave this gem to you first, wasn't he? But he was killed by the goblins when they attacked our village...=heehee ......那是对的。\n那个绅士是第一次给你这个宝石的人，不是他吗？\n但是当他们袭击了我们的村庄时，他被哥布林杀了......
I wish you could have seen how his eyes ran down my whole body every time he visited the dining hall. Actually, he started staring at you in the same crude way recently...=我希望你能看到每次参观用餐大厅时，他的眼睛如何落下我的整个身体。\n实际上，他最近开始以同样的原油方式盯着你......
I was worried that he was going to lay his hands on you one day... Heehee, but no need to worry about that anymore. I'm so glad the goblins killed him...=我担心一天他会把手放在你身上...... Heehee，但不需要担心这一点。\n我很高兴这场妖精杀了他......
Wha...! He would never do that... He was a little naughty sometimes...but he was always nice to me! He bickered with his wife a lot, but they stilled loved each other! He was a good person!=世界卫生大会...！\n他永远不会那样做......他有点顽皮的一些......但他总是对我很好！\n他和妻子争吵了很多，但他们互相爱着彼此！\n他是个好人！
Well... If you say so. But I thought he was no different from the other village men, or even the travelers passing by. They would all look at my body with an obscene gaze, wishing they could have me...=好吧......如果你这么说。\n但我以为他与其他村里的男人没有什么不同，甚至是旅行者经过的旅行者。\n他们都会用淫秽的目光来看看我的身体，希望他们能拥有我......
Same goes for the women. I tried not to stand out in the village by wearing drab clothes, but they still envied my looks... They hated me even after we lost our parents in the epidemic...=对女人来说也是如此。\n我试图通过穿着邋ship的衣服在村里脱颖而出，但他们仍然羡慕我的外表......即使在疫情中失去父母之后，他们甚至讨厌我......
But when I look back at it now, I don't know why it bothered me so much. When I turned into a monster, I realized that all I ever wanted was to see you become happy with a nice family of your own...=但是，当我现在回头看时，我不知道为什么这么困扰着我。\n当我变成一个怪物时，我意识到我所想要的只是看到你对自己的一个漂亮的家庭感到满意......
Oh, I won't allow a family with a human man, though! Heehee... Don't worry, I'll pick out a bunch of wonderful monster grooms suitable for my lovely sister!=哦，我不会允许一个人与人类的家人！ heehee ......别担心，我会挑出一堆精彩的怪物新郎适合我可爱的妹妹！
Damned female... How dare she even suggest that a holy knight sleep with a monster...=该死的女性......她甚至敢于敢于睡觉和怪物睡觉......
You and I both have blue eyes and chestnut-colored hair tied into braids. We even have matching blue ribbons. The village people would always tell us how similar we looked...=你和我都有蓝眼睛和栗色的头发绑成辫子。\n我们甚至有匹配的蓝丝带。\n村里总是告诉我们我们看起来的相似......
And the necklace with this red gem... The goblins saw me with it and liberated me from my ties to humanity. This was your gift to me... It made me so happy...=和这个红色的宝石的项链......那只哥布林看到了我，从我的关系中解放了我。\n这是你给我的礼物......它让我如此开心......
Shut up...!=住口...！
Shut up... Stop talking! You're not my sister!=闭嘴...停止说话！\n你不是我的妹妹！
Why, Ricca...? Don't say that... You're making me so sad... Can't you see... I'm your sister, Miria.=为什么，Ricca......？\n不要说......你让我如此难过......你不能看到......我是你的妹妹，Miria。
Could it be... You don't like my horns and wings? It's true that they sometimes get in the way when I walk through narrow spaces...but I think I look much cuter than before.=它可以......你不喜欢我的角和翅膀吗？\n确实，他们走过狭窄的空间时，他们会妨碍......但我想我看起来比以前更具变化。
Heehee... I'm sure the castle wizard will give you these too if we ask.=Heehee ......我相信如果我们问，我肯定了城堡巫师会给你这些。
You're just jealous, right? You're acting like a spoiled child like always, trying to get my attention...=你只是嫉妒，对吗？\n你像一个被宠坏的孩子一样行事，试图引起我的注意......
I'm not...!=我不是...！
My sister... Miria would never take the side of monsters... She would never...hurt anyone...!=我的妹妹...... Miria永远不会占据怪物的一面......她永远不会......伤害任何人......！
Ricca, that's not true... I'm a demon, a monster. It's only natural that I kill humans. I don't see what you're trying to say...=Ricca，那不是真的......我是一个恶魔，一个怪物。\n我杀了人类只是自然。\n我看不出你想说什么......
Oh... But don't worry. You may be human, but you're an exception. I would never let anyone hurt my precious little sister. I swear.=哦......但不要担心。\n你可能是人，但你是一个例外。\n我永远不会让任何人伤害我珍贵的小妹妹。\n我发誓。
That woman's been brainwashed... Or rather...her thoughts have completely turned into those of a monster.=那个女人被洗脑......或者更确切地说......她的想法完全转变为怪物的思考。
I think you're the disgraceful one, Ricca. You shouldn't be running around in that knight costume wielding something so dangerous...=我觉得你是可耻的一个，♥卡。\n你不应该在那个骑士服装中跑去挥舞着如此危险的东西......
*Sigh* I knew you were always a bit of a tomboy, but this is ridiculous. Are you going through another rebellious phase?=*叹气*我知道你总是有点屁股，但这是荒谬的。\n你要经历另一个叛逆的阶段吗？
I've heard enough! Shut up...you monster!=我已经听过了！\n闭嘴......你的怪物！
I'm going to cut those horns and wings off and get my real sister back!=我要把那些角和翅膀剪掉，让我真正的妹妹回来！
Where did you learn such rudeness, Ricca? *Sigh* I wanted to talk with you a little longer, but I guess you're not willing to...=你在哪里学习这样的粗鲁，Ricca？ *叹气*我想和你谈谈一点，但我想你不愿意......
I need to capture you for Master Archlich. Although, if I had my way, I would prefer to keep you by my side...=我需要捕捉你的Archlich Master。\n虽然，如果我有自己的方式，我宁愿让你靠近我......
This might hurt a little, but I'll make you feel muuuch better afterward, okay?=这可能会伤害一点，但我会让你觉得更好的笨蛋，好吗？

Use "Fire Sword Crystal"?=使用“火剑水晶”？
If you want to turn that human back to normal, you need to exhaust her and stop her movements!=如果你想把那个人转向正常，你需要排除她并阻止她的动作！
Miria... Just wait! I'll get you back to normal!=Miria ......等待！\n我会让你回到正常！
Now, what are you two talking about amongst yourselves? Heehee, I don't want to be left out...=现在，你们两个人在谈论什么？ Heehee，我不想被遗忘......
Ricca, give it up already! I don't want to see my sister prance around in that shameless costume and wield that disgraceful weapon anymore!=Ricca，放弃了！\n我不想看到我的姐姐在那个无耻的服装和挥动那种可耻的武器中的胜利！
You're a weak little girl who can't do anything. You'll never become a good wife if you don't act more like a lady...=你是一个弱小的小女孩，不能做任何事情。\n如果你不像一位女士，你永远不会成为一个好妻子......
Shut up... You're the one who has her boobs half sticking out and her panties on full display!=闭嘴......你是那个有她的胸部一半伸出的人和她的内裤！

Even if it was a matter of life and death, we are two girls that have just rubbed their privates against each other and orgasmed together.=即使这是生死攸关的问题，我们两个女孩只是刚刚擦过彼此的私处性高潮我们在一起。
After calming down and thinking over what has just happened, I feel extremely embarrassed.=在冷静下来，思考刚才发生的事情后，我感到非常尴尬。
Claret seems to feel the same, turning away quickly when our eyes meet.=Claret 似乎也有同样的感觉，当我们的目光相遇时迅速转身离开。
Huff... Nnngh...=生气地说嗯...
Nnngh... Oof... Oww... Nnngh...!=嗯...哦...哦...嗯...！
Claret tries to raise her body so that she's not leaning backwards, but she falls forward instead.=Claret 她试着抬起身体，这样她就不会向后倾，而是向前倒。
Huff... I'm sorry... That felt...too good... I can't...move...=生气地说我很抱歉...那感觉...太好了...我不能...移动
Her head and purple hair land on my breasts... I am too tired to move, but at least my chest is able to cushion her fall.=她的头和紫色的头发落在我的胸前...我太累了，动不了，但至少我的胸部能缓冲她的摔倒。
Huff... I...get it... I can't move...either... Haa... Aaaah...=生气地说我了解了...我不能动...任何一个哈...啊...
Heehee... Haa... Aaah... Yes...=嘿嘿...哈...啊...对
My embarrassment finally subsides as I speak to Claret, and I'm filled with joy as she finally turns to look at me when she replies.=当我和他说话时，我的尴尬终于平息了Claret, 当她终于转过身来看着我时，我充满了喜悦。
Nnngh... Haaah... Aaaaah...!=嗯...哈...啊啊...！
Suddenly, my stomach burns hot and releases a bright red light.=突然，我的胃灼热，并释放出明亮的红光。
The light blinks irregularly and gradually grows weaker.=光线不规则地闪烁，并逐渐变弱。
Huff... Huff... The curse on my tummy...=生气地说生气地说我肚子上的诅咒...
Oh... This light... It looks like...the curse...stopped activating...=哦这盏灯...看起来...诅咒...停止激活...
I'm glad... Huff, huff... Hee... Heehee...=我很高兴...哈夫，哈夫...嘿...嘿嘿...
Claret says it with a smile, and I think to myself that this is the cutest, sweetest expression I have ever seen her make.=Claret 我觉得用我见过的最可爱的表情。
Heehee... Really...?=嘿嘿...真正地
Yes... It stopped... Nngh...=对它停了...嗯...
Claret doesn't respond...=Claret 没有回应...
Maybe she'd given me too much of her magic because of how good we'd made each other feel, and this time she needed help...=也许她给了我太多的魔法，因为我们让彼此感觉很好，而这一次她需要帮助...
Oh... Phew... Heehee...=哦呸...嘿嘿...
