Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 18 The Demon God of the Abyss?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第 1.章8.深渊恶魔之神?
Path to the Deep Sea Cave=通往深海洞穴的道路
Is it really okay not to help them prepare the ship...?=不帮他们准备船真的可以吗...？
Claret went back to her home saying she needed to get some tools. I should have gone with her...=Claret 回到家说她需要一些工具。我应该和她一起去...
But you're going to the bottom of the sea to defeat Poseidon tomorrow. You need to rest up.=但你明天要去海底打败波塞冬。你需要好好休息。
I know...but I feel kinda nervous... The curse on my stomach feels like it's throbbing, too...even though you put on seal on it...=我知道...但我觉得有点紧张...我肚子上的诅咒感觉也在抽搐...即使你在上面盖上了封条...
Still, I'm glad... The soldiers said they'll take their ships to the island and travel with us...=尽管如此，我还是很高兴...士兵们说他们会把船带到岛上和我们一起旅行...
And Claret... Heehee... She's so persistent about coming with us... Maybe everyone else will defeat Archlich, even if I get beaten by him...=和Claret... 嘿嘿...她坚持要和我们一起去...也许其他人都会打败阿奇Ricca，即使我被他打败...
(<indent%3D0.4em>Even an army of mages and town soldiers won't stand a chance against that powerful necromancer... But...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>即使是一支由法师和城镇士兵组成的军队也没有机会对抗那个强大的亡灵巫师...但是……）
Yes, we're fortunate. If it weren't for their help, we wouldn't be able to get to that island. I guess humans can be useful sometimes.=是的，我们很幸运。如果没有他们的帮助，我们就无法到达那个岛。我想人类可能会有用一些次.
So even if you lose, I'm sure things will turn out alright. Don't stress about it too much.=所以即使你输了，我相信一切都会好起来的。不要太紧张。
Okay...=可以
I'm sorry for being a little negative... I'll do my best...tomorrow...=我很抱歉有点消极...我会尽力的...明天
I will...=我会的...
I'll do my best... I really will, so... Ugh... *Sniff*...=我会尽力的...我真的会的，所以...呃*嗅嗅*...
Ugh, uhhh.... *Sniff*... Hick... *Sniff*...=呃，呃*嗅嗅*...乡巴佬*嗅嗅*...
(<indent%3D0.4em>She's been pretending to be upbeat lately... No way she could keep the act going forever...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>她最近一直假装很乐观...她不可能永远继续表演下去……）
(<indent%3D0.4em>Half a month ago...we visited the mine caves again. We didn't find any Drain Crystals, and there were barely any monsters there...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>半个月前...我们又去了矿坑。我们没有找到黑暗水晶s、 那里几乎没有怪物……）
(<indent%3D0.4em>Even if the corpse had turned into Magic Stones, I thought we would at least find some remnant of her sister...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>即使尸体变成了魔法石，我想我们至少会找到她姐姐的一些遗骸……）
Ugggh... Waaaah... Miri...a...... *Sniff*... Hick... Hick...=啊...哇啊...米莉...a、 *嗅嗅*...乡巴佬...乡巴佬...
A human is coming... Come on, lift your head up... Stop crying...=一个人来了...来吧，抬起你的头...别哭了...
Huh...? *Sniff*... I can't just...stop crying...like that...=嗯*嗅嗅*...我不能只是...别哭了...就像那样...
Ugh... I know...=呃...我知道...
*Sniff* Heehee... I can use magic...to clean up my face... Hick... They won't know that I've been crying...!=*嗅嗅……嘿嘿...我可以用魔法...清理我的脸...乡巴佬...他们不会知道我哭了...！
(<indent%3D0.4em>What a waste of magic... But I guess no one wants to see their savior crying like that...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>真是浪费魔法...但我想没人想看到他们的救世主那样哭泣……）
Woah...! Woaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!=哇...！哇啊！！！
Sailor=水手
Ahhh... Ahh... Huff, huff... You surprised me...!=啊...啊...哈夫，哈夫...你让我吃惊...！
Y-You're the knight of God, right...? The one who saved the town from monsters...?=你是上帝的骑士，对吧...？就是那个从怪物那里救了这个镇的人...？
Y-Yes...?=是的...？
Hmm... Your appearance, and that weapon... No doubt about it, you really are the knight from back then...!=嗯... 你的外表和武器...毫无疑问，你真的是当时的骑士...！
Ah, of course you wouldn't remember... Umm... At the quarry, I...=啊，你当然不会记得了...嗯...在采石场，我...

The quarry...?=采石场...？
Eep...! P-Please don't misunderstand me! I quit being a bandit after that day...!=哦...！请不要误解我的意思！从那天起我就不再当强盗了...！
Look...! I'm just a lowly dock worker now...! W-Well, I haven't had much work to do recently, but...=看我现在只是个卑微的码头工人...！我最近没有太多工作要做，但是...
Um... I... That day, I killed...your friends...=嗯...我那天，我杀了...你的朋友们...
Well, I didn't think you were a real knight...=我以为你不是真正的骑士...
You didn't look like one at all when I saw you back at the quarry, hahaha... B-But, I wonder why...? I can believe that you're a knight now...=当我在采石场看到你时，你一点都不像，哈哈哈...但是，我想知道为什么...？我相信你现在是骑士了...

Iris...? Did you find the entrance to the cave?=Iris...? 你找到洞口了吗？

Yup! This is my first time in the ocean! Once our battle is over, let's all have fun at the beach!=是的！这是我第一次在海里！战斗结束后，让我们在海滩上玩得开心！
Haha, that sounds lovely.=哈哈，听起来不错。
The rocky area that marks the undersea cave is right ahead of us.=海底洞穴的岩石区域就在我们前面。
The cave is in the water, right? Claret said that if I use the ring and crystal ball she gave me, we can go through it, but I'm a little doubtful...=洞穴在水里，对吗？Claret 她说如果我用她给我的戒指和水晶球，我们可以通过它，但我有点怀疑...
Upon grapple defeat by Hell Serpent\r\n"The drowning holy knight" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=在被地狱蛇击败后\n“溺水者圣骑士" H场景（已经看过）
The giant sea snakes coming out from the ocean floor are hell serpents. They're a type of dragon.=从海底出来的巨型海蛇是地狱蛇。他们是龙的一种。
They'll shoot water bullets at you and try to drag you down even deeper into the ocean. If you ever get caught by one of them, shake it off with all your might.=他们会向你发射水弹，试图把你拖到更深的海里。如果你被其中一个抓到，尽你所能摆脱它。
I grew up in the mountains, so I'm not very good at swimming. I'll drown if they drag me down into the depths of the sea...=我在山里长大，所以我不太擅长游泳。如果他们把我拖到海里，我会淹死的...
This must be the entrance to the cave.=这一定是山洞的入口。
The crystal ball Claret gave me... It's amazing that I can talk to her from afar with this.=水晶球Claret 给了我...我能用这个从远处和她说话真是太神奇了。
Claret, we've arrived at the cave at the bottom of the sea.=Claret, 我们到达了海底的洞穴。
*Sniff* *Sniff*... Huff, huff... Aaah... Ricca's bedsheets...!=*嗅嗅**嗅嗅*...哈夫，哈夫...啊...Ricca's床单...！
Huh? What's that strange voice...? Is there something wrong with the crystal ball?=嗯？那奇怪的声音是什么...？水晶球有什么问题吗？
She said that the connection gets worse when we're too far apart...but I thought it would still work from this distance...=她说当我们相隔太远的时候联系会变得更糟...但我觉得在这么远的地方它仍然有效...
Huff... *Sniff* *Sniff*... Heehee... I think I'll wrap this around my naked body... Take off my cape and belt...and my blouse...=哈夫*嗅嗅**嗅嗅*...嘿嘿...我想把我的身体裹起来...脱下我的斗篷和腰带...还有我的衬衫...
Huh? Claret? Clareeeet!=嗯？Claret? 克莱里埃！
Huh...? Eeep... Ricca!?=呵呵...？哎呀...Ricca!?
Claret, what's wrong...? Did something happen?=Claret, 怎么了...？发生什么事了吗？
Ah, I can explain this...! Um... Huff, huff... I was just in the middle of changing... I haven't done anything weird!=啊，我可以解释这个...！嗯...哈夫，哈夫...我正处于变化的中间…我没有做任何奇怪的事！
Hey, Claret. We arrived at the entrance to the cave. What should we do now?=嘿Claret. 我们到达了山洞的入口。我们现在该怎么办？
Oh... Um... In that case... Heehee, put the ring I gave you on your ring finger.=哦嗯...那样的话嘻嘻，把我给你的戒指戴在你的无名指上。
Alright... Um, then hold still for a moment. I'm going to send you magic from here to activate the ring.=好吧那就别动一会儿。我将从这里向你发送魔法来激活戒指。
Okay, I put it on.=好的，我戴上了。
Okay, you should be able to breathe underwater now.=好了，你现在应该可以在水下呼吸了。
You can use your spells from far away too? You're so amazing, Claret!=你也可以从很远的地方使用你的咒语？你太棒了，Claret!
All I did was send my magic to your ring through the crystal ball to activate the spell I engraved into it beforehand. Besides, both of those tools were made by my parents...=我所做的只是通过水晶球将我的魔法传送到你的戒指上，激活我事先刻在戒指上的咒语。此外，这两个工具都是我父母做的...
Still, I'm amazed that you knew how to use it like this.=尽管如此，我还是很惊讶你知道如何像这样使用它。
Thank you... I have to warn you about a few things, though. Since this spell interferes with other magic, you won't be able to use your own magic while my spell is activated.=非常感谢。不过，我得提醒你几件事。因为这个法术会干扰其他魔法，所以当我的法术被激活时，你将无法使用你自己的魔法。
My own magic...?=我自己的魔法...？
Stuff like sword throwing is off limits, then.=那么，扔剑之类的东西是禁止的。
You also won't be able to use crystals that add extra magic to your weapon, and your magic will be gradually consumed while you're underwater. You won't be able to breathe once you run out of magic, so please be careful.=你也不能使用水晶为你的武器增加额外的魔法，当你在水下时，你的魔法会逐渐被消耗掉。一旦魔法耗尽，你将无法呼吸，所以请小心。
Okay, I understand. Iris... You can't swim, either, right?=好吧，我明白。Iris... 你也不会游泳，对吗？
That's right... I'll have to stay inside your body for a while.=这是正确的...我得在你体内待一会儿。
I'll send you magic through the crystal ball before you dive into the water.=在你潜入水中之前，我会通过水晶球给你施魔法。
Wow, it feels warms... Thank you, Claret. I didn't know crystal balls could be this useful.=哇，感觉很温暖...非常感谢。Claret. 我不知道水晶球会这么有用。
Phew... Sadly, the connection isn't as good as physical contact, so I can't send you magic over and over again...=呸...可悲的是，这种联系不如身体接触好，所以我不能一次又一次地给你施魔法...
Wait... Physical contact... You mean like last time...?=等待身体接触...你是说像上次一样...？
I wanted to come with you, but a mage is just dead weight if she can't use her magic... I'll be waiting for you at the town inn...=我想和你一起去，但是如果一个法师不能使用她的魔法，那她就是负重的...我会在城镇旅馆等你...
It's okay, you've been very helpful. I'll call back when I defeat the sea god.=没关系，你帮了大忙。当我打败海神时，我会再打给你。
Okay, please be safe...!=好的，请注意安全...！
The water resistance makes it hard to move... But it's so strange. I'm actually walking on the ocean floor!=水的阻力使它很难移动...但这太奇怪了。我实际上是在海底行走！
Moving in water will be slower, but you will be able to jump higher. Just be careful not to overshoot.=在水中移动会比较慢，但你可以跳得更高。只是小心不要过度。
I don't have to take breaths thanks to Claret's spell... I think I could swim if my weapon and outfit were lighter, too...=多亏了你，我不需要呼吸Claret's咒语...我想如果我的武器和装备更轻的话我也能游泳...
In front of you! It's coming straight at us!=在你面前！它正朝我们冲过来！
Huh!? Eeeek!=呵呵！？哎呀！
How are you doing on magic? I know the mage told you about it already, but if you run out of magic energy, you're going to suffocate and drown.=你的魔术怎么样了？我知道法师已经告诉过你了，但是如果你的魔法能量耗尽，你会窒息而死。
Drown...!? I don't want to die in the middle of the ocean where no one would even know about it!=淹死我不想死在没有人知道的海洋中央！
I don't either. We can't be too hasty, but we better hurry before we become fish food.=我也不知道。我们不能太匆忙，但我们最好在变成鱼食之前快点。
You've obtained a memory of the "HP Drain" skill.=您已获得“HP吸取”技能的记忆。
Here it comes again! Watch out!=又来了！小心
I can see a light... There must be an area with a big air pocket ahead of us.=我能看见一盏灯...我们前面一定有一个大气穴。
I can finally get out of the water! I've had enough of being underwater...=我终于可以出水了！我已经受够了在水下...
*Sigh* My clothes and hair are completely soaked... My mouth tastes salty, too...=*唉* 我的衣服和头发都湿透了...我的嘴也有咸味...
Is this place...an altar for worshiping the sea god...? It must've been made by humans long ago...=这个地方...祭拜海神的祭坛...？它一定是很久以前人类制造的...
My body feels sticky from the saltwater... Ugh, I wanna clean myself...=我的身体因为海水而变得黏糊糊的...呃，我想把自己弄干净...
Don't purify your body until we defeat the sea god. He should be around here somewhere...=在我们打败海神之前不要净化你的身体。他应该在附近某个地方...
*Gasp* I sense powerful magical power...coming from the sea...!=*我感觉到强大的魔法力量...来自大海...！
Mission : Escape from the massive tentacles=任务：逃离巨大的触角

We're almost there! We can make it!=我们快到了！我们能做到！
O-Okay!=好吧！
Like I thought. Those tentacles can't reach us up here.=就像我想的。那些触手够不到我们。

That's right... That time we got chased down a hill by a golem... You left me behind back then, Iris...=这是正确的...那次我们被一个傀儡追下山...那时候你把我甩在后面了，Iris...

I can still sense its magical power... If that thing is Poseidon, we have to find a way to fight it...=我仍然能感觉到它的魔力...如果那东西是波塞冬，我们必须想办法对付它...

His body must have morphed under the influence of the evil magic overflowing from the island.=他的身体一定是在岛上溢出的邪恶魔法的影响下变形的。
Poseidon... He used to be a god idolized by humans...but now he's a creature who's sunk ships and taken many lives...=波塞冬...他曾经是人类崇拜的神...但现在他是一个沉船夺去许多生命的生物...
The cave ceiling is collapsing! Watch out for falling rocks!=洞穴的天花板要塌了！小心落石！
You think you can beat me with these rocks...!? I'll hit them back at you!=你以为你能用这些石头打败我...！？我会回击你的！
He fell! Now is your chance! Beat him to a pulp!=他摔倒了！现在是你的机会！把他打成肉酱！
He's trying to trample you! Look out!=他想践踏你！留神
The tentacles are tangled onto me... Eeeek!=触手缠在我身上...哎呀！
Is he trying to swallow you whole!? No...! Break free from him!=他想把你整个吞下去吗！？不挣脱他！
Huff, huff... Did I...defeat Poseidon...?=哈夫，哈夫...我是不是...打败波塞冬...？
There's still a faint trace of magic energy left... He probably withdrew into the bottom of the ocean. I'm sure he'll stay down, though.=还有一丝魔法能量留下...他很可能逃到了海底。不过我相信他会趴下的。
So that giant... He used to be a prayed to as god around here...but the magic from the island made him ferocious, right...?=所以那个巨人...他曾经是这里的神...但是岛上的魔法让他变得凶猛，对吧...？

Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 16 The Temple of Spiders?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第 1.章6.蜘蛛神庙?
Abandoned Temple=废弃寺庙
A few hours' walk from Claret's house, in the peaceful port town...=从这里步行几个小时Claret's的房子，在宁静的港口小镇...
Port Town Man=港口城市人
A knight that's been raiding monsters' territories and rampaging about, huh?=一个突袭怪物领地并横冲直撞的骑士？
Port Lady=港口小姐
Apparently, she's going around destroying the big red crystals inside monsters' territories. I heard a rumor that the red crystals attract monsters and make them violent.=很明显，她正在破坏怪物领地内的红色大水晶。我听说有传言说红色水晶会吸引怪物，让它们变得暴力。
I wonder if the reason we can't take our boats out to sea is due to those crystals?=我想知道我们不能出海的原因是不是因为那些水晶？
I don't know. But surprisingly, that knight is said to be a messenger of God and is a young girl.=我不知道。但令人惊讶的是，这位骑士据说是上帝的使者，而且是个年轻女孩。
A messenger of God... Sounds like a fairy tale.=上帝的使者...听起来像童话故事。
A fairy tale...? Ahh, you're right, there was a story like that. Where they fight against evil mages and big dragons, right?=童话故事...？啊，你说得对，有这样一个故事。他们在那里对抗邪恶的法师和巨龙，对吗？
I wonder if the knight is a cute girl... I want to meet her...=我想知道骑士是不是一个可爱的女孩...我想见见她...
Haha! According to rumor, the knight swings around a weapon that's as big as she is and fights monsters. She's probably built like an orc.=哈哈！据传闻，这位骑士挥舞着和她一样大的武器，与怪物搏斗。她可能长得像个兽人。
An orc... I-I guess... Hey you... Don't destroy my hopes and dreams...=兽人...我想...嘿你...不要摧毁我的希望和梦想...
Ricca, let's buy some clothes at that store next. My clothes look a little tight on you...=Ricca, 我们下一步去那家商店买些衣服吧。我的衣服穿在你身上有点紧...
Too tight...!? That's not... Well, it's a little true... But I can transform with my holy powers...and I'm fine with my sister's hand-me-downs...=太紧了...！？那不是...嗯，这有点真实...但我可以用我神圣的力量改变...我对我姐姐的旧衣服很满意...
Oh... I'm sorry... You're embarrassed by all the patchwork, right? I understand if you don't want to be seen walking with me.=哦我很抱歉...你对所有的拼凑感到尴尬，对吧？如果你不想被看到和我一起走，我理解。
That's not true... But you're a young lady, Ricca. Don't you want to dress up and look pretty?=那不是真的...但你是个年轻的女士，Ricca. 你不想打扮得漂亮点吗？
Do I...? I mean, I have to fight monsters, and I'm pretty busy training with Iris these days. I don't have the time to dress up...=我是不是...？我的意思是，我必须和怪物战斗，而且我还忙于训练Iris 这些天。我没有时间打扮...
You can't be working all the time. Let's go for a little breather.=你不可能一直在工作。让我们休息一下。
What do you think of this outfit, Ricca? I think it's cute!=你觉得这套衣服怎么样，Ricca? 我觉得很可爱！
Huh? Wow... That skirt is so short... I can't wear that...=嗯？哇！那条裙子太短了...我不能穿那个...
What, really? I didn't think you'd say that...=什么，真的？我没想到你会这么说...
My sister told me that men who are attracted to flashy girls aren't any good, so... I'm a little reluctant to wear anything sexy...=我姐姐告诉我，被花哨女孩吸引的男人一点都不好，所以...我有点不愿意穿性感的衣服...
Your sister said so...? I see... But your holy knight form usually has a skirt much shorter than this.=你姐姐这么说的...？我懂了...但是你的圣骑士 form通常有一条比这短得多的裙子。
H-Hey...! Claret! Don't talk about me being the holy knight out in the public! There are already rumors going around...=嘿...！Claret! 不要说我是第一个圣骑士 公开露面！已经有谣言传开了...
Oh... I'm sorry. But still... Your knight form skirt is very short. You know you flash your underwear every time you jump, right?=哦我很抱歉。但还是...你的骑士裙很短。你知道你每次跳的时候都会闪动内衣，对吧？
Wha...? Oww...=什么...？哦...
How do I say this... I feel like I'm someone else when I'm transformed, like my body moves on its own...so I haven't really thought about it before... Is it really that noticeable?=我该怎么说...当我被改变的时候，我觉得我是另一个人，就像我的身体自己在移动...所以我以前没想过...真的那么引人注目吗？
Yes! You're constantly flashing your panties left and right... I've been wondering why you didn't seem bothered.=对你不停地把你的内裤左右晃来晃去...我一直在想你为什么看起来不介意。
Oh... I see... Ugh... I'm so embarrassed now...=哦我懂了...呃...我现在很尴尬...
It's gotten dark. Let's stay at an inn tonight.=天黑了。我们今晚去客栈吧。
Sure. Today was so much fun... Do you come to this town often, Claret?=当然今天太有趣了...你经常来这个镇吗，Claret?
Yes, about once or twice a month. I come here to buy groceries as well as ingredients for magic potions.=是的，大约一个月一两次。我来这里买食品杂货和魔药的原料。
Really? It's quite far from your place, though. We left in the morning, and it was already noon by the time we arrived. I thought I was used to walking in the mountains, but it must be tough walking over here every time.=真正地不过离你住的地方很远。我们早上离开，到达时已经是中午了。我以为我已经习惯在山里散步了，但每次在这里散步一定很艰难。
Compared to all the training, monster fighting, and Drain Crystal hunting you do, this trip is nothing.=与所有的训练、怪物战斗和黑暗水晶 如果你想打猎，这次旅行就没什么了。
Heehee... I guess I have been working hard lately, but I've gotten used to it. So where's the inn?=嘿嘿...我想我最近一直在努力工作，但我已经习惯了。客栈在哪？
The one I often go to should be close by. The two-person room only has one double-sized bed, but we can share it...=我经常去的那个应该就在附近。双人间只有一张双人床，但我们可以共用...
Hey, sorry to interrupt, but...=抱歉打断一下，但是...
Iris?=Iris?
Quiet down a little... The town soldiers look like they're panicking. Something must've happened.=安静一点...镇上的士兵看起来很惊慌。一定发生了什么事。
Port Town Soldier A=港口城镇士兵A
Hey, did you hear?=嘿，你听说了吗？
Port Town Soldier B=港口城镇士兵B
The tailor's daughter was attacked by an arachne on her way back from the capital. And then her boyfriend Paul...=裁缝的女儿在从首都回来的路上被一只蜘蛛袭击了。然后她的男朋友保罗...
Port Town Captain=港口城市队长
You lot, what are you doing? Go back to your stations.=你们这些家伙，你们在干什么？回到你的车站。
Captain...! Is it true that Paul went to the arachne's nest to save that girl?!=队长保罗真的去了阿拉克涅的巢穴去救那个女孩吗？！
Then we should go help...!=那我们应该去帮忙...！
No. The monsters around the town have become more active than usual. Our job is to protect this town and the harbor. We can't leave.=没有。镇上的怪物比平常更活跃了。我们的任务是保护这个城镇和港口。我们不能离开。
B-But... That means we're leaving Paul and the girl to die...=但是...这意味着我们要让保罗和那个女孩去死...
I've sent word to the capital that the arachne have become more active. I've asked them to provide backup as soon as possible, but we can't do anything until they arrive.=我已经向首都发出消息，阿拉克涅变得更加活跃。我已经要求他们尽快提供支援，但在他们到来之前我们什么都做不了。
......I understand...=......我理解...
If only the rumored knight was around...=如果传说中的骑士在场...
Ah... Isn't there anything we can do...?=啊...我们能做点什么吗...？
The arachne... They are using an old temple as their nest. They never did anything so violent before...=蜘蛛侠...他们正在用一座古庙作为巢穴。他们以前从没做过这么暴力的事...
Zzz... Zzz... Mmmngh...=Zzz...Zzz...嗯...
Phew... This should do it...=呸...这应该够了...
Ricca... Heehee... Don't tickle me so much... Ahahaha...=Ricca... 嘿嘿...别这么逗我...哈哈哈...
Heheh... I wonder what she's dreaming about?=嘿嘿...我想知道她在梦想什么？
I'm sorry, Claret... I still think fighting monsters is too dangerous for a girl like you...=我很抱歉，Claret... 我还是觉得和怪物搏斗对你这样的女孩来说太危险了...
Heeheeee... I'm not...scared of any monsters... I'm...following your rules...=嘿嘿...我不是...害怕任何怪物...我是遵循你的规则...
Your parents... They're sure to be worried about you...=你父母...他们肯定会担心你...
Do you think she'll be mad at us when she realizes we left while she was asleep?=当她意识到我们在她睡着的时候离开了，你觉得她会生我们的气吗？
Not like we can do anything about it. You know she would have whined and followed us if she was awake.=我们对此无能为力。你知道，如果她醒着的话，她会发牢骚跟着我们。
That's true, but I feel so bad... I know that arachnes are supposed to be really strong, but Claret trained and fought monsters with us before...=没错，但我感觉很糟糕...我知道蛛形纲动物应该很强壮，但是Claret 以前和我们一起训练和战斗过怪物...
You don't want to put her in danger, right? We left her a note, so I'm sure she'll forgive us when we get back and apologize.=你不想让她陷入危险，对吧？我们给她留了张便条，所以我相信我们回来道歉时她会原谅我们的。
Hmm... But Claret can be pretty stubborn sometimes... I think she'll put me on cleaning and cooking duty for a while...=嗯... 但是Claret 有些人可能很固执次... 我想她会让我做一段时间的清洁和烹饪工作...
Well, that's enough talk about the mage... They're weak, but I sense the dark waves of a Drain Crystal. I think it's from inside the temple.=好了，关于魔法师的讨论到此为止...但我对波浪的感觉很弱黑暗水晶. 我想是从庙里传来的。
Okay. Let's look for it while we search for the captured people, too.=可以让我们在寻找被俘者的同时也去寻找它。
The undead in this area might be the remains of the people the arachnes captured.=这个地区的不死族可能是阿拉喀尼斯人俘虏的人的遗骸。
Looks like we better hurry and find whoever is still alive... By the way, Iris, what kind of monsters are arachnes?=看来我们最好快点找到谁还活着...顺便说一句Iris, 蜘蛛是什么样的怪物？
They're spider-women monsters. They use spider webs to trap their pray so they can't move.=他们是蜘蛛女怪物。他们用蜘蛛网诱捕祈祷者，使他们无法移动。
They live in herds, but the ones with black bodies are stronger than the others. Watch out for them.=它们成群结队地生活，但身体黑色的比其他的更强壮。小心他们。
You know so much, Iris. It's a big help. ...Thanks♪=你知道的太多了，Iris. 这是一个很大的帮助...谢谢♪
H-Huh...? O-Of course I do! I'm outstanding even among my peers in my fairy village, you know! You should count your blessings.=嗯...？我当然知道！你知道，即使在我的仙女村里的同龄人中，我也很出色！你应该数你的祝福。
The upper body of a girl and the lower body of a spider... So that's what arachnes look like...=女孩的上半身和蜘蛛的下半身...这就是蛛形纲动物的样子...
They've gone mad from the Drain Crystal's evil magic. They may look cute, but they're quite ferocious.=他们从一开始就疯了黑暗水晶'这是邪恶的魔法。它们看起来可能很可爱，但却很凶猛。
I don't want to hurt girls...but I need to save the captured townspeople...=我不想伤害女孩...但我需要拯救被俘的镇民...
Upon grapple defeat by Arachne (Black)\r\n"Caught in the arachne's web" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=在与阿拉克涅的格斗中失败（黑色）\n“落入蜘蛛网”\nH场景（已经看过）
We could have talked this out if they weren't under the influence of the Drain Crystal... But we have no choice.=如果他们没有受到法律的影响，我们本可以把这件事说出来的黑暗水晶... 但我们别无选择。
A spider web cage... Looks like a wyvern is trapped in it.=蜘蛛网笼子...看起来像是一只飞龙被困在里面了。
Is it for food? It doesn't look that tasty...=是用来吃的吗？看起来没那么好吃...
Mister soldier, are you okay?=士兵先生，你没事吧？
I'm, uh... I'm a traveling knight. I overheard that soldiers from the port town were captured here, so I came to save you!=我...我是一个旅行骑士。我无意中听到港口镇的士兵在这里被俘，所以我来救你！
Soldier Paul=士兵保罗
You're a young girl! You can't be here in this monster's lair all by yourself!=你是个年轻女孩！你不能一个人呆在这个怪物的巢穴里！
I see, so you're... If that's the case, I saw a lever near here. If you use the lever, the cage should open.=我明白了，所以你...如果是这样的话，我看到附近有个杠杆。如果你使用杠杆，笼子应该打开。
I think there's a mechanism somewhere that'll open the cage...=我觉得某个地方有一个机制可以打开笼子...
Just wait there. I'll find a way to release you right away.=就在那儿等着。我会想办法马上释放你。
I'm fine, thanks. Actually, there's one more person that's being held prisoner.=我很好，谢谢。事实上，还有一个人被囚禁了。
It's a woman from the town, right? I promise I'll save her, mister soldier. You wait here, or escape the temple and go out where it's safe.=是镇上的女人，对吗？我保证我会救她的，士兵先生。你在这里等着，或者逃离寺庙，到安全的地方去。
I want to go with you, but I'll just slow you down... Alright then, since we're close to the temple's entrance, I'll sneak out and wait for you outside.=我想和你一起去，但我会让你慢下来...好吧，既然我们离寺庙入口很近，我就溜出去在外面等你。
I want to go with you, but I'll just slow you down... She's being held in the cage that's located in the middle of the temple. I'll sneak out and wait for you outside.=我想和你一起去，但我会让你慢下来...她被关在寺庙中间的笼子里。我会溜出去在外面等你。
Heehee, I might not look like it, but I'm actually pretty strong. Wait here for a minute. I'll look for a way to open the cage.=嘿嘿，我可能看起来不像，但我其实很强壮。在这里等一下。我会想办法打开笼子的。
You are...?=你是...？
The cage opened... Damn it... I came here to help, but ended up needing rescuing myself... How pathetic of me...=笼子打开了...该死的...我是来帮忙的，但最后需要自救...我真可怜...
Are you okay?=你没事吧？
You've obtained a memory of the "Parry Hit Cancel" skill.=你已经获得了“招架命中取消”技能的记忆。
I came to save you! Are you alright?=我是来救你的！你没事吧？
Yes! I heard about you at the port town, so I came to rescue you!=对我在港口镇听说了你，所以我来救你！
Thank you... I think there's a switch somewhere that'll open the cage...=非常感谢。我想某个地方有个开关可以打开笼子...
I see, a switch... Hold on just one moment. I'll go look for it.=我明白了，一个开关...等一下。我去找找。
I'll get you out of here in no time, miss.=小姐，我马上带你出去。
Miss knight... Thank you...=奈特小姐...非常感谢。
You must mean Paul... Thank goodness... Um, Miss Knight... There's a creepy-looking red crystal past here. Do you know what it is...?=你一定是说保罗...谢天谢地...奈特小姐...这里有一块令人毛骨悚然的红色水晶。你知道这是什么吗...？
I helped the port town soldier out as well. He should be waiting for us outside the temple.=我也帮助了港口镇的士兵。他应该在寺庙外面等我们。
I'm alright... Thank you...=我没事...非常感谢。
The cage opened... Are you alright? Are you hurt anywhere!?=笼子打开了...你没事吧？你受伤了吗！？
You're...a girl...knight...?=你是...一个女孩...骑士
Huh? Okay... I'll wait here...=嗯？可以我会在这里等...
Red crystal...? That's the Drain Crystal! Please wait here for a minute! I have to go destroy it!=红色水晶...？这就是问题所在黑暗水晶! 请在这里等一下！我得去摧毁它！
Um... There's a big crystal past here...=嗯...这里有一块巨大的水晶...
<size%3D150%>Riccaaaaa!</size>=<size%3D150%>Ricca啊！</size>
What? Claret!?=什么Claret!?
(<indent%3D0.4em>She really did follow us... What a stubborn girl...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>她真的跟着我们...多么固执的女孩……）
Huff... Huff... Ricca...=生气地说生气地说Ricca...
I'm sorry I left while you were asleep...=很抱歉我在你睡觉的时候离开了...
Yes... That was so mean... I wanted to help you...=对太卑鄙了...我想帮你...
But you can make up for that later... We have a problem!=但你以后可以弥补...我们有麻烦了！
The town... The port town... It's under attack by monsters!=镇上...港口城市...它被怪物攻击了！
What... The port town...!?=什么港口...！？
I tried to assist the town and fight with them, but there were too many... The soldiers are trying their best to fight back...but I don't think they'll last...=我试图帮助镇上的人，并与他们战斗，但有太多...士兵们正在尽力反击...但我不认为它们会持续...
But maybe you can...=但也许你可以...
Alright, let's go. Claret, can you please take the soldiers somewhere safe...?=好的，我们走吧。Claret, 你能把士兵带到安全的地方吗...？
Of course...! I'll take them over to the main road for now!=当然我现在就把他们带到大路上去！
Chapter 16    The Temple of Spiders=第 1.章6.蜘蛛神庙

Mage's House=法师的房子
She's cute...=她很可爱...
She looks like...she's either the same age as me... Or maybe a little older... But her chest... is pretty big...=她看起来像......她是和我一样的年龄......或者可能有点老...但是她的胸部......非常大......
Oh... I should hurry...=哦......我应该赶紧......
E-Excuse me... I have to get on top of you. You probably don't want to do this with me, but... It's my first time too... Please forgive me...=e-pre-prem ......我必须靠在你身上。\n你可能不想和我一起这样做，但是......这是我第一次......请原谅我......
*Kiss*... Nnngh... *Lick*... Mmmch...=*吻* ...... nnngh ... * lick * ...钳住...

Y-Yes... Huff, huff... I'm fine...=y-是的...... huff，huff ...我很好......
I'm so glad! I was so worried, you were asleep this whole time!=我很高兴！\n我很担心，你整整一次睡着了！
Mage Girl=法师女孩
Huh...? Where am I...? I thought I was...assaulted by an orc, and...=呵呵......？\n我在哪里...？\n我以为我被兽人殴打，......
This is my home. And don't worry about the monster - I drove it away. Your clothes were wet from the rain, so I washed them. They're currently drying.=这是我的家。\n不要担心怪物 - 我开了它。\n你的衣服从雨中潮湿，所以我洗了他们。\n他们目前正在干燥。
Clothes...? Oh... I'm naked...=衣服...？\n哦......我赤身裸体......
I-I'm sorry... Umm... I tried not to look at you too much...=我 - 对不起......嗯......我试图不要看起来太多......
Um, well... Thank you for saving me, Miss Mage... Ugh... Nnngh... Uuurk... Aaugh...=嗯，好吧......谢谢你拯救我，Mage Mage Mage ......呃...... Nnngh ...... Uuurk ...... Aaugh ...

Is this...a memory from the fortress in the woods, too...?=这是......从树林里的堡垒中的记忆力......？
Well... I understand how embarrassing it would be to talk about what the goblins did to her... Still...=好吧......我理解谈论那些哥布林对她所做的事情有多尴尬......仍然......

(<indent%3D0.4em>A sword struck in her back... She must've been... By those goblins surrounding her... She's just like my friends...who were raped and killed...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>一把剑在她的背上击中......她一定是由那些围绕着她的那些哥布林......她就像我的朋友......被强奸和杀死的人......）

*Sniff*... Ugh... Uuuuugh...=*嗅* ...... uuuugh ...
(<indent%3D0.4em>I haven't cried this much since my brother died... I don't...deserve to be a big sister...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>自从我的兄弟去世以来，我没有哭得这么多......我不......值得成为一个大姐姐......）
(<indent%3D0.4em>Still... I need to repay my debt to her... And to her older sister...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>还是......我需要把债务偿还给她......以及她的姐姐......）

(<indent%3D0.4em>If she turns down the offer to become a knight again, I won't blame her. It's God's fault for giving such a cruel mission to a normal human girl...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>如果她再次拒绝提议，再次成为骑士，我不会责怪她。\n对一个正常的人类女孩提供如此残酷的使命是上帝的错......）
(<indent%3D0.4em>Still... I did say some terrible things to her... I'm not sure what I should say when I see her again...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>还是......我确实为她说了一些可怕的事情......我不确定我再次见到她的时候应该说的......）
I came back...so I can fulfill my mission! I don't want to upset God, after all!=我回来了...所以我可以履行我的使命！\n毕竟，我不想让上帝烦恼！
I see... You're right... I have a duty as a holy knight...=我明白了......你是对的......我有一个责任作为一个......
Th-That isn't the only reason... You left me behind again at the entrance of the cave! My pride won't allow that! I'm going to follow you around whether you like it or not!=这不是唯一的原因......你在洞穴的入口处再次让我落后！\n我的骄傲不允许！\n无论你喜欢还是不喜欢你，我都会关注你！
It's not like I can find another person worthy of becoming a holy knight, either. And you can't just leave me behind in the rain like that...=它不像我能找到一个值得成为一个人的人。\n你不能让我像那样让我落后于雨中......
It's just... This brooch is too heavy to carry alone, alright!?=这只是......这个胸针太重了，不能单独携带，好吧！？
I know... I'm sorry... Please forgive me...=我知道......对不起......请原谅我......
And I need to repay your sister...for saving us... That's why... I wanted to come back...to talk and learn more about you...=我需要偿还你的妹妹......为了拯救我们......这就是为什么......我想回来......要谈谈和了解更多关于你的信息......
You may be stupid and weak...but you're still brave, even without your holy knight form. I thought you looked dignified and beautiful...=你可能是愚蠢和弱的......但你仍然勇敢，即使没有你的圣骑士形。\n我以为你看起来有尊严和美丽......
Heehee... You're amazing too, Iris. You're God's helper...! And you're very cute... I don't see it often but...you're adorable when you smile.=heehee ......你也很棒，♥。\n你是上帝的帮助者......！\n而且你很可爱......我不经常看到它，但是......当你微笑时，你是可爱的。
C-Cute...!? Hmph...! Anyway, are you sure you want to fight as a holy knight again?=c-cute ...！？ HMPH ......！\n无论如何，你确定你想再次打架吗？
Yup! I made up my mind! I want to help people! No matter what happens, I'm going to defeat the monsters and fulfill my duty as a holy knight!=对！\n我想好了！\n我想帮助人们！\n无论发生什么事，我都会击败怪物并履行我的职责！
God...? Holy knight...? Brooch...?=上帝...？\n圣骑士...？\n胸针...？
Okay... Well... Let's work together again...=好的......好吧......让我们再次工作......
Heehee, yup! Thanks for your support, Iris!=嘿，yup！\n谢谢你的支持，♥！
Um... Iris... I know it's kinda late, but there's something I've been curious about... Could you hold still for a second?=嗯......我知道这是有点迟到的，但是有些东西我一直很好奇......你能坚持一秒钟吗？
What is it? What are you getting close to me for...? Huh...?=它是什么？\n你有什么靠近我的......？\n呵呵......？
Sullied... Virginity...?=陷入困境......童贞......？
Hey, don't be so loud! Claret is right there...=嘿，不要那么大声！\n克罗尔就在那里......
I actually...got a chance to see your memories from the brooch. They were from when you were captured by monsters...=我实际上......有机会从胸针看你的回忆。\n当你被怪物捕获时，他们来自......
Oh... Y-You did...?=哦......你做了......？
I did...and I still want to stay by your side. That's God's will, as well as mine. I'm so sorry you had to suffer through that... I'm sorry I didn't realize, either...=我做了......我还是想留在你身边。\n那是上帝的旨意，以及我的旨意。\n我很抱歉，你必须遭受痛苦......对不起，我没有意识到，要么......
Thank you... B-But...are you sure it's alright...?=谢谢...... B  - 但是......你确定好吗......？
*Sigh* Didn't I tell you before? Our God is a goddess. She doesn't care whether her servants are virgins or not.=*唉*我之前没有告诉你？\n我们的上帝是女神。\n她不在乎她的仆人是否是处女。
B-But...you said she can change her form...and the outfit under my armor is like a white wedding dress...so I thought that maybe she's actually a lewd man...=B-and
Lewd man...? *Sigh* You're so stubborn... Let's say God was a pervert. How would you explain servants like me, then?=猥亵男人......？ *唉*你是如此顽固......让我们说上帝是一个变态。\n那你怎么说仆人，然后？
We fairies live a lot longer than humans, so we have a lot more life experience. If God was picky about purity like you think she is, there wouldn't be anyone qualified to serve her!=我们仙女的生活比人类更长，所以我们有更多的生活经历。\n如果上帝挑剔纯洁，就像你认为她一样，没有任何人有资格为她服务！
Oh... I get it... Well...does that mean you have a lot of...experience, too, Iris?=哦，......我得到它......好吧......这意味着你有很多...体验，也是吗？
What? Me...? I don't have any men in my life. I've been called the Queen of Frost behind my back because of how busy and unapproachable I... Hey! What are you trying to get me to say!?=什么？\n我...？\n我生命中没有任何男人。\n由于我有多忙和不可接受，我被称为霜后的女王。嘿！\n你想让我说什么！？
Ahaha... Sorry, sorry...=Ahaha ...对不起，对不起...
Hmph... A-Anyway, don't think that God would abandon you for something like that. It's disrespectful! Just rude!=HMPH ......无论如何，不​​要以为上帝会抛弃你的东西。\n这是不尊重的！\n粗鲁！
Heehee... Sorry about that... Hee...he...he...=heehee ...对此感到抱歉......嘻嘻......他......他......
Ah...! Ricca...! She suddenly collapsed... What's going on!?=啊...！\nRicca......！\n她突然崩溃了......发生了什么！？
Oh no...! This magic wavelength... Could it be...!?=不好了...！\n这个魔法波长......可以......！？
Woah... Fair... Iris! What are you doing between Ricca's legs...?=哇......公平......Iris！\n你在Ricca的腿之间做了什么......？
Ugh... So heavy... Human mage...! Do you know each other? Please, help her...!=呃......这么沉重......人类法师......！\n你们相互认识吗？\n拜托，帮助她......！
Huh... Ah, yes! I'm Ricca's friend...!=呵呵...啊，是的！\n我是Ricca的朋友......！

Chapter 14    The Witch and the Village Girl=第1章4女巫和乡村
Going back in time, to a day before Claret's house was attacked by Orcs...=回到过去，到克萨尔的房子被兽人袭击之前的一天......
What!? You've read all the books in here, Claret!?=什么！？\n你在这里阅读了所有书，克罗尔！？
Yes, most of them. You're welcome to read whatever tickles your fancy!=是的，大多数人。\n欢迎您阅读您的花哨的速度！
I can? Then...don't mind if I do...=我能？\n然后......不要介意我是否这样做......
Wow, this book... The text is so dense, and it's filled with strange patterns... I don't think I can read these characters...=哇，这本书......文字是如此密集，它充满了奇怪的模式......我不认为我能读取这些角色......
The books around there are my father's collection of healing spells. Piled over here are my mother's combat magic books.=周围的书籍有我父亲的愈合法术。\n堆在这里是我母亲的战斗魔法书籍。
Wow... That's amazing... I fall asleep reading books if they aren't filled with pictures. I can't read anything too difficult, either...=哇......这真是太棒了......如果没有填满图片，我就会睡着了阅读书籍。\n我无法阅读任何太难，要么......
I like stuff like encyclopedias on animals and plants.=我喜欢像动物和植物上的百科全书这样的东西。
I think most people are like that. I only read these because I'm a mage living in the middle of nowhere. I have nothing else to do when I'm bored.=我想大多数人都是这样的。\n我只读这些，因为我是一个生活在茫茫荒野的法师。\n当我无聊时，我没有别的事情要做。
So that's how you got so smart... Even though you're younger than me...=所以这就是你那么聪明的方式......即使你比我年轻......
Heehee! I bet I know more about magic than the mages in the royal capital! I know a lot of things you don't, too, Ricca!=嘻嘻！\n我打赌我更了解魔法比皇家资本的法师更了解！\n我也知道你不做的事情，也是你的话！
Hmm... Is that so...=嗯......那是......
Then...do you know about succubus crystals...?=然后......你知道魔术晶体吗？
Succubus crystals...? That's a common name for a kind of light-red gem. What about them?=魅魔水晶......？\n这是一种浅红色宝石的常见名称。\n他们呢？
One time...I gave one to someone as a present. Oh, I didn't buy it for them, though. I gave what I received from someone else as a gift...=一次......我给了一个人作为礼物。\n哦，我没有为他们买它。\n我给了我从别人那里收到的礼物......
I was just wondering if that person who gave it to me knew what it was... He said that a mage that visited the village dropped it off, but... I wonder if he knew...about the color... You know?=我只是想知道那个把它给我的人知道它是什么......他说一个参观村里的法师把它放下了，但是......我想知道他是否知道......关于颜色......\n你懂的？
"You know"...? About what? You're still talking about that rock that's made out of powdered life crystal and magic stone, right?=“你懂的”...？\n关于什么？\n你还在谈论那块岩石，它是用粉状的生活水晶和魔法石做出的吗？
By the way, the light-red color comes from the mixture of pink life crystal and deep-red magic stone.=顺便说一下，浅红色来自粉红色的寿命和深红色魔石的混合物。
I see... But that isn't what I was asking about. I heard that the crystal's color represents a girl's...=我明白了......但这不是我问的。\n我听说水晶的颜色代表一个女孩......
A-Actually, never mind. Heehee... I think they're pretty, but I guess they're not that popular, huh?=实际上，没关系。 heehee ......我认为他们很漂亮，但我想他们不是那么受欢迎，呵呵？
Umm...? I suppose due to their lack of clarity, they aren't often worn as gemstones.=嗯......？\n我想由于他们缺乏清晰度，他们通常不作为宝石磨损。
They're not completely worthless, though. Because refining magic stones can be difficult, and they can be used as little good-luck charms, they're relatively expensive. They're good substitutes for carrying around money.=但是，他们并不完全毫无价值。\n因为精炼魔术石块可能很困难，所以它们可以用作少许好运的魅力，它们相对昂贵。\n他们是携带金钱的好替代品。
Yes, indeed.=确实是的。
I also know that some regions think the succubus crystal signifies the color of a woman's genitalia. They're typically just called pink crystals around here, though...=我也知道一些地区认为魔术水晶表示女人的生殖器的颜色。\n他们通常只是在这里叫粉红色晶体，但是......
G-Genitalia...!? Umm... Does that mean... H-Hey... So you did know, Claret!?=G-Genitalia ......！？\n嗯......这是否意味着...... H-嘿......所以你已经知道了，克萨尔！？
Heehee, you were trying to get me flustered, weren't you? Hehe! Too bad it didn't work!=Heehee，你试图让我变得慌乱，不是吗？\n呵呵！\n太糟糕了，它不起作用！
I may be younger than you, but I'm pretty knowledgeable!=我可能比你年轻，但我非常了解！
U-Urk... I see...=你看到...
(<indent%3D0.4em>I thought Iris taught me a lot of stuff, but... I guess I'm no match for her when it comes to knowledge about magic...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我以为♥教我很多东西，但是......我想我觉得魔术知识时对她没有匹配......）
Yup! Heehee! Would you like me to teach you what I know?=对！\n嘻嘻！\n你想让我教你我所知道的吗？
(<indent%3D0.4em>Whoa, Claret's eyes are glittering... She must love teaching people. She's been letting me stay at her place for a while now, so I don't want to hurt her feelings...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>哇，克萨尔的眼睛是闪闪发光的......她必须喜欢教人。\n她一直让我留在她的地方，所以我不想伤害她的感情......）
S-Sure... Maybe you could teach me a little...=肯定......也许你可以教我一点......
Alrighty, then! I'm a little surprised by how childish you can be, though, Ricca. Did you really think you could embarrass me with that little tidbit?=好吧，然后！\n我有点惊讶你可以幼稚，Ricca。\n你真的认为你能用那个小的潮汐难堪吗？
Am I that childish...? I-I mean, I know a lot of things too, like...this and that...<size%3D50%>I have...experience too... Even if it was forced... Ugh *Sob*...</size>」=我是那个幼稚......？\n我 - 我的意思是，我也知道很多东西，就像......这个......<size%3D50%>我有......体验......即使它被迫......呃*呜咽* ...</size>」
You do? Heehee! Oh, I know... If you're going to travel back to your village, I'll teach you how to make rare crystals. They'll come in handy for your trip.=你做？\n嘻嘻！\n哦，我知道......如果你打算回到你的村庄，我会教你如何制作稀有水晶。\n他们会派上你的旅行。
Chapter 15=第1¼5

Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 10 Town of Undead?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第十章 不死之城？
Town Ruins=城镇废墟
(<indent%3D0.4em>It's been about two weeks...since I was raped by goblins...and found Miria turned into a demon... It usually comes around this time...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>已经两周了。。。自从我被哥布林强奸。。。发现米莉亚变成了恶魔。。。通常在这个时候……）
(<indent%3D0.4em>Could it be... Do I have a goblin baby in me...? No... Sometimes my curse will get hot, but otherwise I'm fine...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>可能是。。。我有一个妖精宝宝吗。。。？不一些次 我的诅咒会变热，但除此之外我很好……）
(<indent%3D0.4em>Miria told me...that the semen... The baby seeds...were all eaten up by that slime... And I've transformed over and over, so I should be clean...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>米莉亚告诉我。。。精液。。。婴儿种子。。。都被粘液吞噬了。。。我已经一次又一次地改变了，所以我应该是干净的……）
I can feel a Drain Crystal ahead of us...=我能感觉到前方有一块排水水晶。。。
Umm... If I'm remembering right... That's the direction of that town Miria and I visited a long time ago...=嗯。。。如果我没记错。。。那是米莉亚和我很久以前去过的那个城镇的方向。。。
Are you saying there's a Drain Crystal in that town...?=你是说那个镇上有个排水水晶。。。？
x8=x8
Oh no... All the buildings are ruined... It was so lively when I came here with my sister before...=哦不。。。所有的开发号他们都毁了。。。以前我和妹妹来这里的时候非常热闹。。。
It's become overrun by the undead now. Brace yourself.=现在它已经被不死族占领了。振作起来。
This place has ghouls and wraiths now, too... This town is just like the forest settlement...=这里现在也有食尸鬼和幽灵。。。这个城镇就像森林聚居区。。。
Eek! A big ghoul...!?=哎呀！一个大食尸鬼。。。！？
The evil magic caused the ghoul to swell up and grow large... It doesn't seem especially strong, but defeating it will give you lots of Magic Stones.=邪恶的魔法使食尸鬼膨胀并变大。。。它看起来并不特别强大，但击败它会给你很多魔法石。
Upon petrification defeat by Gazer\r\n"Petrified and frozen" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=在被Gazer石化失败后\n“石化和冻结”\nH场景（已经看过）
A big eyeball...? Urk... It's so slimy and gross...=大眼球。。。？乌尔克。。。它又黏又恶心。。。
That monster's called a gazer. They're creatures used for scouting and guarding.=那怪物叫凝视者。它们是用来侦察和守卫的生物。
The fireballs it conjures are powerful too, but watch out for its demonic gaze. If you get hit by its ray of light, your body will be cursed and you'll turn to stone.=它召唤的火球也很强大，但要注意它恶魔般的凝视。如果你被它的光线击中，你的身体会被诅咒，你会变成石头。
Your holy knight powers can gradually heal you if only part of your body turns to stone, but don't think you can return to normal if you become completely petrified.=如果你身体的一部分变成石头，你的神圣骑士力量可以逐渐治愈你，但是如果你完全僵化了，不要认为你可以恢复正常。

But it takes them a moment to activate their magic, so they're defenseless while they wait. That's your time to attack.=但是他们需要一段时间来激活他们的魔法，所以他们在等待时毫无防备。现在是你进攻的时候了。
Okay. I'll watch out for the magic circles.=可以我会留意魔法圈的。
Looks like there are two paths ahead - top and bottom.=看起来前面有两条路——顶部和底部。
The top path has a lot of monsters, but the bridge on the bottom path is broken in places... Which way should we go?=上面的小径有很多怪物，但是下面小径上的桥有些地方坏了。。。我们应该走哪条路？

<b>Special attack「Sword Throw」</b>\r\n Keyboard:C Key\r\n Controller:2 Button<line-height%3D150%>\r\nThrown magic swords will stick into cliffs or walls.<line-height%3D100%>\r\nYou can use stuck swords as  platforms.<line-height%3D150%>\r\nUsing special attacks will drain the blue gauge in the top left of the screen.=<b>特别攻击「掷剑」</b>\r\n 键盘：C键\n控制器：2个按钮<line-height%3D150%>\r\n投掷的魔法剑会粘在悬崖或墙壁上。<line-height%3D100%>\r\n你可以用卡住的剑作为平台。<line-height%3D150%>\r\n使用特殊攻击将耗尽屏幕左上角的蓝色仪表。
You can use your powerful holy knight body to grab and move along the chains suspended in the air.=你可以使用你强大的圣骑士身体抓住悬挂在空中的锁链并沿着锁链移动。
You'll be defenseless while you're hanging, though, so call me over if you see an enemy. I'll attack them with my magic.=你悬挂的时候会毫无防备，所以如果你看到敌人，请呼叫我。我会用我的魔法攻击他们。
<b>Grab on to chains</b>\r\n Keyboard:↑ Key\r\n Controller:2- Axis<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Move left</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard:← Key\r\n Controller:1- Axis<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Move right</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard:→ Key\r\n Controller:1+ Axis<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Let go of chains</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard:X Key\r\n Controller:3 Button=<b>抓住锁链</b>\r\n 键盘：↑ 钥匙\n控制器：2轴<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>向左移动</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n 键盘：← 钥匙\n控制器：1-轴<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>向右移动</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n 键盘：→ 钥匙\n控制器：1+轴<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>放开锁链</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n 键盘：X键\n控制器：3按钮

You're going to the mountains in the afternoon, right?=你下午要去山上，是不？
The sun feels amazing! Today's weather is perfect!=阳坡棒极了！今天的天气太好了！
General Store Lady=百货商店小姐
Soldier Donnie=士兵Donnie
Let's see, I'm pretty sure the hill in this direction has a bunch of different herbs...=让我看看，我觉得山的这个方向上有一堆奇异的草药...
Let's see... Oh! Heheh, a branch like this should work.=让我看看...哦呵呵，像这样的灌木枝条应该符合。
I feel bad for hitting these slimes with a stick... As long as I don't get close to them, all they do is squirm.=要用棍子打这些史莱姆，我挺伤心...只要我不靠近他们，他们就只会蠕动罢了。
It's so shiny and pretty...=它又闪又亮...
Whoa...! There's letters in the sky!=哇...！天上有浮空的字！
Is this...a magic sign? Is this a trick someone set up?=这是...神奇的启示？还是某人设的小把戏吗？

Hmm, what does it say...? These characters are kinda hard to read, but I think it says..."How to defeat monsters."=嗯，上面写的什么...？这些古文有点难读，但我觉得上面说...“如何打败怪物。”
I-I got them!=我...我拿下它了！
Heehee! I'm actually stronger than I thought! Alright, let's get rid of the rest of them!=嘿嘿！我其实比我想象的要强壮！好嘞，把剩下的都处理掉吧！
Upon defeat by Slime\r\n"Licked by a slime" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=被史莱姆打败后\n“被史莱姆舔”\nH场景（已经看过）

<b>Jump</b>\r\n Keyboard:Z Key\r\n Controller:3 Button=<b>跳跃</b>\r\n 键盘：Z键\n手柄：3按钮
Oh, this shiny red stone... It's a Magic Stone. Sometimes monsters drop them, or you can find them floating in the air.=哦嚯，这个闪亮的红色石头...是魔法石。一些怪物会掉落，或者你可以在空中发现它们。
They're a magic tool. If I take them to the general store I help out at, I can exchange them for money.=妙极的小玩意。如果我把它们带到我帮忙的杂货店，可以将其换成钱。
Even if I had a basket full of them, I'd only have enough money to buy a snack, though...=即使我有满满一篮子，也只不过够买点儿小零食...
<b>HP Gauge</b>\r\n The red gauge in the top left corner will decrease when you take damage from an enemy.\r\n Ricca will be defeated upon losing all HP.\r\n In addition, if you're defeated when the [Upon defeat ~ H scene]\r\n prompt in the bottom left is visible, then...\r\n Try your best to avoid being defeated by monsters.=<b>HP条</b>\r\n 当你受到敌人的伤害时，左上角的红色仪表将降低。\nRicca 在失去所有生命后将被击败。\n此外，如果你在左下角的提示\n[失败时~H场景]时失败，那么...\n请尽量避免被怪物打败。
I know. I'll collect a bunch of stones and spend the money to buy some sweets for Miria.=正巧。我收集堆魔法石头，然后花些钱给Miria买些糖果。
Hehe, I think she'll forgive me for coming home late if I give her a bunch of sweets.=呵呵，如果我给她一束糖果，就算我回家晚了，她也会原谅我的。
<b>Magic Stone</b>\r\n Enemies will drop red stones of condensed magic when they're slain.\r\n They'll come in handy later so be sure to collect them.\r\n There is one hidden Silver Magic Stone per stage\r\n and it's worth about 50 Magic Stones.=<b>魔法石</b>\r\n 敌人被杀时会掉落浓缩魔法的红色石头。\n它们以后会派上用场的，所以一定要把它们收起来。\n每个关卡有一个隐藏的银色魔法石\n价值约50块魔法石。
Phew, I'm here! Teehee... There are so many butterflies out today!=唷，我来了！嗨嗨...今天外面竟然有那么多蝴蝶！
Time to pick some herbs for the general store and Miria.=是时候为杂货店和Miria采药了。
Okay, this should be enough for both of them.=好了，这绝对管够二者了。
Oh... Is that the church bell I hear? Then it must be evening already.=哦，我貌似听见教堂的钟磬之音了，又到晚上了。
I got a bunch of Magic Stones too. I wonder what I should get for Miria.=我也有一堆魔法石。不知道该给Miria买什么。
Hello, mister... Or should I say, "good evening?"=你好，先生...额，晚上好？
General Store Owner=杂货店店主
She'll be fine. Besides, a beauty like Miria doesn't need our help. She can flirt a little and make a traveler hers in no time...=她会没事的。此外，像Miria这样的美女不需要我们的帮助。她可以调情一点，让一个旅行者很快成为她的...
I'm home!=我回来了！
They're kinda gross...but I should be able to handle slimes by myself, right?=它们有点恶心...但我自己应该能处理史莱姆，应该吧？
She might even tell me never to go into the mountains again.=她甚至可能会叫我再也别上山了。
And so is Miria... She's going to get really scared if I tell her that I saw a monster, too...=Miria也是...如果我告诉她我也看到了怪物，她会吓坏的...
Mister merchant is going to be disappointed in me...=商人先生会对我失望的...
*Sigh*=*叹息*
They move pretty slow, so I could just run away if it gets dangerous, and I should get rid of them before they attack anyone else. I don't want Miria treating me like a kid forever, either.=它们移动得很慢，所以如果有危险的话我可以逃跑，我应该在它们攻击其他人之前把它们赶走。我也不想Miria永远把我当孩子看待。
I remember watching mister merchant drive them away by hitting them with a stick, too...=我记得我也曾看着商人先生用棍子打他们，把他们赶走...
But there are so many of them... No, if I don't get rid of them now, they're going to attack the village's livestock and children.=但是这么多小怪物...不，如果我现在不除掉它们，它们会攻击村子里的牲畜和孩子。
Wh-What's with that pillar of light? It came out of nowhere... I think it's made of magic...=那根光柱是怎么回事？不知从哪里冒出来的...像是用魔法做成的一般...
Once I'm back at the village, I need to drop these herbs off at the general store.=我一回到村子，就得把这些草药送到杂货店。
Oh, hey Ricca. Hiya.=哦，嘿Ricca. 你好。
Here are the herbs you asked for.=这是你要的药草。
Hahahah... Here we go again...=哈哈哈...又开张啰...
Great, thank you always! How were the mountains? Did you see any monsters? I heard they're pretty restless lately...=很好，谢谢你总是这么给力！山里的情况如何？ 你看到什么怪物了吗？ 我听说它们最近很不安分...
There were a lot of slimes, but I was able to defeat them by hitting them with a stick, just like you did that time.=有很多史莱姆，但我能用棍子击打它们，就像你当时做的那样。
Really? There were slimes...? Are you injured, Ricca?=真的吗？有史莱姆...？你受伤了没有，Ricca?
Heehee, no need to worry. I was strong enough to beat them myself. See? Hyah! Hyah! Take that!=嘿嘿，不用担心。我足够强壮，可以自己打败他们。看好了，嗨！嗨！拿着吧！
That's impressive... But you still ought to be careful. If something happened to you, Miss Miria is going to get mad at me for sending you off on the errand in the first place.=真行啊你...但你还是要小心。如果你出了什么事，Miria小姐会生我的气的，因为一开始就派你去出差。
Ahahaha, everyone's a worrywart just like Miria... Oh, that's right...!=哈哈，每个人都像Miria一样忧心忡忡...哦，没错...！
I collected some Magic Stones while I was out picking the herbs. I wanted to buy something for Miria.=我在外面采药的时候收集了一些魔法石。我想给Miria买点东西。
Alright, just leave those here then. Give me a minute so I can count them.=好吧，那就把这些留在这儿吧。给我点时间，让我数一数。
Okay!=可以！
Hmm... Should I get her snacks, or something else...?=哼唔...我该给她买点零食还是别的什么...？
Be careful...=小心...
Oh, what's this gem? It's a necklace... It's so cute...!=哦，这是什么宝石？是条项链...太可爱了...！
Hm? Oh, that. I got it from a young mage girl earlier today in exchange for some medicinal herbs.=嗯？哦，那个。今天早些时候，我从一个年轻的法师女孩那里得到了它，以换取一些草药。
(<indent%3D0.4em>A mage girl...? I wonder if she made the magic sign I saw on the mountain path, too...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>一个法师女孩...？我想知道她是否也做了我在山路上看到的魔法符号...）
Heehee, I bet Miria would look really pretty with this necklace...=嘻嘻，我打赌Miria戴上这条项链一定会很漂亮...
The merchant's wife said she was feeling down lately, too...=商人的妻子说她最近也很沮丧...
Um...mister? Is it true that Miria looked like she was feeling down?=嗯...先生？Miria看起来情绪低落是真的吗？
Ugh, why'd she have to say that...? W-Well... I probably got the wrong idea.=她为什么要这么说...？嗯...我可能想错了。
One, ten, hundred, thousand... Urk...=一、十、百、千...哦吼...
I see... But still...I think I can splurge a bit. How much is this necklace again?=我明白了...但还是...我想我可以奢侈一下。 这条项链多少钱来着？
Ricca, do you want that necklace?=Ricca, 你想要那条项链吗？
Go on, you can take it. I'll give it to you in exchange for the Magic Stones.=去吧，你可以拿着。我把它给你，以换取魔法石。
Huh? But...I don't think there are enough stones for...=嗯？但是...我觉得没有足够的石头...
Huh? Yes... Oh, but... I can't...=昂？是呢...喔，但是，我不能...
It's fine. You're always helping out at my store, and you're going to give that to Miss Miria, right? Ghaha! I'd love to see that necklace on her as well.=没事。你总是在我的店里帮忙，你会把这个给Miria小姐，对吗？哈哈！我也想看看她戴项链。
Oh, mister... You really mean it?=哦，先生...你是认真的吗？
Thank you so much!=非常感谢！
Now hurry on back home and give that present to Miria. She's going to look beautiful with it.=现在赶快回家把礼物送给Miria。她戴上会很漂亮的。
Okay! I'll be back tomorrow to help out again. See you, mister!=好的！我明天再来帮忙。 再见，先生！
Hahaha, out you go! I'll have you look after the store tomorrow.=哈哈哈，走吧！明天我会让你照看这家商店。
Eek! Mister! Don't hit my butt!=哎呀！先生！别打我屁股！
Ghahaha! You're growing into a busty lady too! Say hello to Miria for me!=哈哈哈！你也在长成一个丰满的女子！代我向Miria问好！
Oh, mister... Alright, see you tomorrow!=哦，先生...好吧，明天见！
Oh, Ricca, you're back from the mountains.=哦，Ricca，你从山上回来了啊。
Oh, hello, ma'am. Excuse me, I need to get going.=你好，女士。对不起，我得走了。
Oh my, off already? She must be in a hurry to get back to Miria.=天哪，着什么急？是急着要找Miria啊。
Hey, what happened to the necklace that was here?=嘿，这个项链是啥情况？
Oh, the one with the gem? I, um, gave it to Ricca...=哦，有宝石的那个？ 我，嗯，我把它给了Ricca...
I can't imagine Ricca being able to afford it though... Don't tell me you didn't take any money...=但我无法想象Ricca能负担得起...别告诉我你没收她任何钱...
Well, um, I thought it would look good on Miss Miria... And it's not like I gave it to her for free...=我觉得戴在Miria小姐身上会很好看...我又不是免费给她的...
Alright, I'll forgive you for giving it to Ricca. I appreciate her for always helping out at the store, but...=好吧，我会原谅你把它送给Ricca，我很感激她总是在店里帮忙，但是...
Why have you been calling her sister "Miss" Miria lately?=你最近为什么叫她姐姐“Miria小姐”？
And you know what people call that gem you gave her, too, don't you!?=你也知道人们怎么称呼你给她的宝石吧！？
Well...I was talking about it in front of the church... I mean, at the dining hall... A busty girl like Miria could easily get a guy to marry if she just dressed sexier...=这个额...我在教堂前谈论这件事...我是说，在餐厅...像Miria这样的胸部丰满的女孩，只要打扮得更性感点，就很容易找到男人结婚...
Busty girl... Marry...? Don't stick your nose into other people's business, you perverted old man!=胸部丰满的女孩...？别插手别人的终身大事，你这个变态老头！
Eek...! Sorry! I didn't mean it like that!=哎呀...！很抱歉！我不是那个意思！
Those girls have been through a lot, though...=那些女孩经历了很多，不过...
Their parents died in the epidemic only two years after Ricca was born. But I guess that's what happens when a herb picker tries to play doctor...=她们的父母在Ricca出生两年后死于疫情。但我猜当一个采药者试图扮演医生时就会发生这种情况...
Back then, Miria was even younger than Ricca is now, but she was so put together.=那时，Miria甚至比现在的Ricca年少，但她是如此完美。
The town chipped in some money, but Miria raised Ricca pretty much on her own... I'm sure she wanted to have fun like most teenage girls, too.=镇上凑了些钱，但Miria基本上是靠她自己拉扯大了Ricca...我相信她也想和大多数十几岁的女孩一样，开开心心的。
She could've relied on others a little more...but I guess there weren't many people to rely on back then, either. A lot of people got sick.=她本可以再依赖别人一点...但我想当时也没有多少人可以依靠。很多人都生病了。
Yeah... And then some people started blaming the epidemic on Miria's family. They said that they brought the sickness when they moved in, or that someone as pretty as Miria must be a witch or a succubus...=是 啊...然后一些人开始将疫情归咎于Miria的家人。他们说她们搬进来的时候带来了疾病，或者像Miria这样漂亮的人一定是女巫或魅魔...
How ridiculous. It's far more likely that the sickness was brought in by some traveler.=真是荒唐！我看呐，这种病更有可能是由一些旅行者带来的。
Exactly. As proof, I'm healthy as can be, and I've been close to them all this time! I gave the asshole who started the rumor a good punch in the face.=确实如此。我可作证，我一直都很接近她们，而我如此健康！我狠狠地打了那个造谣的混蛋的脸。
That was so wonderful what you did... I wouldn't have fallen for you if it weren't for that.=你做的太棒了...如果不是因为这个，我不会爱上你的。
Ghahaha... Right? I used to feel so sorry for Miria back then, it was hard to even look at her. Even though she had those amazing breasts and ass...=哈哈哈...是么？正当那时，我对Miria的事很难过，甚至很难直视她。尽管她有着惊人的胸部和屁股...
But Ricca's all grown up now. It's about time Miria settled down, so I gave her that necklace as my way of supporting her, okay? It was a pure, kindhearted gesture...=但是Ricca现在都长大了。Miria该安顿下来了，所以我给了她那条项链作为我支持她的方式，好吗？这是一个纯洁、善良的表示...
And I'm telling you her private life is none of your business, pervert! And you were lying about how she seemed down, too!=我告诉你，她的私生活不关你的事，变态！你还撒谎说她看起来情绪低落！
Maybe it has something to do with how the monsters are getting restless... No, probably just a coincidence.=也许这与怪物们变得不安有关...不，可能只是巧合。
A lot of strange things have been happening lately... A bunch of slimes appeared, magical letters written in light came out of nowhere, and now I find a brooch and a doll...=最近发生了很多奇怪的事情...一堆史莱姆冒了出来，在光柱写下的魔法浮空字不知从哪里冒了出来，现在我又发现了一枚胸针和一个洋娃娃...
After I make up with Miria, I'll ask her to teach me how to make a little dress for her.=在我和Miria和好之后，我会让她教我如何为她做一件小裙子。
Hmm... This fairy doll is cute, but a little too risque... It would be kinda awkward to use her as an ornament in the house...=呃...这个仙女娃娃很可爱，但有伤风化...把她当作家里的装饰品会有点尴尬...
I don't care what happens to me... Please grant me a trial...=我不管发生什么事...请允许我试一试...
Well, if a traveler dropped this, I bet he'll stop by the village, so it's fine if I take these back with me for now, right?=好吧，如果一个旅行者丢了这个，我估计他会在村子附近停下来，所以我现在把这些带回去也没关系，对吧？
A brooch and a doll... I wonder if someone dropped them. But people from the village rarely come this way...=胸针和洋娃娃...我想知道是不是有人掉了。但是村里的人很少走这条路...
Woof?=汪汪？
If I just eat more, they'll get bigger in no time... Hey, what am I even talking about? Hehehe...=如果我多吃点，它们很快就会变大...哎呦，我到底在说什么？呵呵嘿...
I-I mean, I think my breasts are pretty big, too... I'm sure they'll grow more! I'm Miria's sister, after all!=我，我觉得吧，我的胸部也很大...我相信它们会长大的！我毕竟是Miria的妹妹！
Oh, for a little doll, her breasts are big. They might be as big as Miria's if she was human-sized...=哦，对一个小娃娃来说，她的胸部挺大呀。如果Miria和人类一样大的话...
Fairy's Puppet?=仙女木偶？
She's pretty too... What's this on her back? Wings...? She looks like those fairies I saw in my book.=她也很漂亮...她背上是什么？翅膀...？她的模样像我在书中看到的仙女。
It's...a brooch and a doll of a little girl... Wow, her skin and hair are so well made...=这是...一枚胸针和一个小女孩玩偶...哇，她的皮肤和头发做得真好...
*Whine*... *Whine*...=*呜呜*...*呜呜*...
Whoa!=哇！
Hey, you shouldn't run off like that, Polon...=嘿，你不应该跑那么欢，Polon...

*Sigh* Fake crying isn't going to work on me. It's about time you stopped being a picky eater.=*唉*，假哭对我没用。你该停止挑食了。
I do, but you shouldn't be a picky eater. I've already prepared the beans, so give the raw tomatoes a try, okay? You might find out you actually like them.=是的，但你不应该挑食。我已经准备好豆子了，所以试试生吃西红柿，行吗？你可能会发现你其实很喜欢它们。
No way... *Sniff*... I think tomato soup would be better... Tomatoes have slimy stuff around their seeds... Urk... *Sniff*=不可能...*吸气*...我想番茄汤会更好...番茄的种子周围有粘稠的东西...呃...*吸气*

Helping out at the shop is fun, and I don't get bored of playing with Polon and the forest animals. I'm even getting a little fatter from all the delicious meals I eat...=在商店帮忙很有趣，我并不会厌倦和Polon以及森林里的动物嬉戏。何况我尝过这么多佳肴，变得有点儿胖了...
You say that, but I doubt it. Heehee! And I'm already plenty happy right now!=你这么说，但我很怀疑。 嘻嘻！而且我现在已经很开心了。

I would. Our parents in heaven will be sad if both of us die single...=我会的。如果我们两个都形单影只地死去，我们在天堂的父母会很伤心...

That's not true... I don't hate you... But if you keep living in the village, every day will be just like any other day. We'll both end up as old ladies before we know it.=胡说...我不恨你...但是如果你继续住在村子里，每一天都活得差不多。不知不觉，我们都会变成老太太。

Hmm, the port town, huh... That's near the ocean, right? I'm not good at swimming, though... The capital has too many people, too. I got dizzy in those crowds when we went to visit Olivia for her wedding.=嗯，港口小镇，嗯...就在海边，对吗？不过我不擅长游泳...首都的人口也太多了。我们去为了参观Olivia的婚礼时，在人群中我都感到头晕。
Hey, Ricca. Have you ever thought about leaving this village? I recently had a customer from the eastern port town saying they were looking for new help to hire.=嘿Ricca. 你想过离开这个村子吗？我最近有一位来自东部港口城镇的客户说，他们正在寻找新的雇佣助手呢。
I have some money saved up, so if you want to, we could get you a place to live in the port town. Or maybe a young lady like you would prefer the capital?=我存了些钱，如果你愿意，我们可以在港口城市给你找个地方住。 还是说像你这样的年轻女士更喜欢去首都？

<b>Special attack「Throw Magic Stone」</b>\r\n Keyboard:C Key<line-height%3D100%>\r\n Controller:2 Button<line-height%3D150%>\r\nThrow a Magic Stone that you've picked up.<line-height%3D100%>\r\nYou will lose a Magic Stone with each throw.=<b>特殊攻击「投掷魔法石」</b>\r\n 键盘：C键<line-height%3D100%>\r\n 手柄：2按钮<line-height%3D150%>\r\n扔出你捡到的魔石。<line-height%3D100%>\r\n每次投掷损失一块魔法石。

<b>Weak and strong attacks</b>\r\n Attacking while standing still will allow you to unleash quick weak attacks\r\n and attacking while moving will allow you to unleash strong attacks.\r\n Strong attacks are slow and tend to leave you vulnerable\r\n so be sure to watch your enemy's movements closely before using them.=<b>弱攻击和强攻击</b>\r\n 站着不动的时候进行攻击以发动快速的弱攻击\n移动的时候进行攻击以发动强大的攻击。\n强攻击很缓慢，往往会让你有破绽\n所以在使用之前，一定要仔细观察敌人的行动。
Haa... Haa... I beat him...=哈...哈...我打败了他...
Hurry... I need to get home!=火速...我得回家了！
<b>Life Crystal</b>\r\n Collecting red heart crystals\r\n will restore your HP.=<b>生命水晶</b>\r\n 收集红心水晶\n将恢复你的HP。
<b>Game over</b>\r\n When Ricca is defeated by a monster,\r\n the remaining number of Continues will decrease.\r\n You can see how many continues you have from the pause menu.\r\n (It's the number next to the sword icon in the top-right)\r\n When your remaining number of continues hits 0,\r\n it'll be game over and you'll be returned to the stage select menu.=<b>游戏失败</b>\r\n Ricca 被怪物打败时，\n继续重试的次数将减少。\n可以从暂停菜单中查看\n（右上角剑图标旁边的数字）\n当你剩余的继续次数达到0时，\n再次游戏失败后，你将返回关卡选择菜单。

Chapter 1    Emissary of Sunlight=第一章    阳光使者
-----------------------补加文本
Inside the castle lived a giant bird that turned people into stone. Nevertheless, the knight used the large sword gifted to him by God and defeated the bird.=城堡里住着一只巨大的鸟，它把人变成了石头。尽管如此，骑士还是用上帝赐予他的大剑消灭了此鸟。
When the knight reached the top of the castle, the evil wizard appeared along with an ominous light. The wizard spoke...=当骑士到达城堡顶部时，邪恶的巫师出现了，伴随着不祥的光芒。巫师说...
"Servant of God! Holy Knight! You must be a fool to come challenging me! I will defeat you and take over your body!"=“上帝的仆人！圣骑士！你来挑战我，真是个彪子！我会拿下你，接管你的身体！”
But the knight was unfazed by the evil wizard's words. Before he finished talking, the knight cut the wizard in half with his sword!=但是骑士并没有被邪恶巫师的话吓到。还没说完，骑士就用剑把巫师切成了两半！

"But you won't beat me that easily. In exchange for my life, I will summon a great, powerful dragon from the World of Darkness and use him to crush you!"=“但你不会那么容易打败我的。作为我生命的交换，我会从黑暗世界召唤一条强大的巨龙，用它来粉碎你！”
Darkness surrounded the area and a dragon even bigger than the castle appeared in front of the knight. The dragon opened his mouth and tried to swallow the knight.=黑暗包围了这片区域，一条比城堡还要大的龙出现在骑士面前。龙张开嘴试图吞下骑士。

He collected that power in his sword, made it shine bright like the sun, and pierced it into the dragon.=他在剑中会聚了这种力量，使它像太阳一样闪闪发光，并用其刺向阿龙。
The holy power struck the dragon. Its light was unbearable for the creature who lived in darkness.=神圣的力量击中了龙。它的光对生活在黑暗中的生物来说是无法忍受的。
The dragon gave up on swallowing the knight and left to return to the World of Darkness.=龙放弃了吞下骑士的念头，回到了黑暗的世界。
And so, thanks to the brave act of the holy knight sent from heaven, the wicked wizard was defeated, the evil dragon was sent back to the World of Darkness, and everyone was saved.=故而，由于来自天堂的圣骑士之勇，邪恶的巫师被击败，邪恶的龙被送回黑暗的世界，所有人都得救了。

================以下为CG：被史莱姆舔的目录=================

Ricca tangling with a slime=Ricca与一只史莱姆缠绕

Slime anal rape=史莱姆肛交强奸
Intestinal penetration=肠道插入
Bulging belly slime excretion=膨肚史莱姆排泄
Ricca's fainting\r\nexpulsion orgasm=Ricca的晕厥-排出性高潮
The price of being a tomboy=当假小子的代价
Excretion=排泄
======================被史莱姆舔的词如下=============================
Nooo...! M-My clothes... They're dissolving...! I-Is the slime eating me!?=不...！我，我的衣服...正在溶解...！是不是史莱姆要吃，吃了我！？
Oh no, is it going to melt my body too...?=啊，别，它也会融化我的身体吗...？

Those goblins came from the foot of the mountain. They must be the same group that attacked the settlement there, too. You might be able to get some information from the settlers.=那些哥布林是从山麓那边来的。他们肯定也袭击了定居点的那群人。你也许能从定居者那里得到一些信息。

Chapter 2    The Kidnapped Maiden=第 2 章    被绑架的少女
Its movements are slow...but be careful. It's far more durable than other monsters you've fought. Even as a holy knight, you'll suffer a lot of damage if its large arms destroy your armor.=它的动作很慢...但要小心。它比你遇到过的其他怪物更耐揍。即使成为圣骑士, 如果它巨大的手臂摧毁了汝之盔甲，你会大残。

R-Right... If I let this monster in the village, it's going to wreck everyone's homes!=窝...草...如果此妖孽突破防线，残存的家园皆且为所毁！

Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 4 The Brooch of Sunlight?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第 4 章 阳光胸针？
<b>Mana Crystal</b>\r\n Collecting a blue crystal will recover\r\n MP which is used for special attacks.=<b>魔力水晶</b>\r\n 收集蓝色水晶将恢复\r\n 用于特殊攻击的MP。
<b>Continue Crystal</b>\r\n If you possess a yellow crystal\r\n then when your HP reaches 0,\r\n you can restart from where you picked it up.=<b>继续水晶</b>\r\n 如果你拥有黄色水晶\r\n 当你的HP达到0时，\r\n 您可以从拾取它的位置重新开始。
<b>Chests</b>\r\n Pressing the attack button while standing in\r\n front of a chest will allow you to open it.\r\n Chests contain Magic Stones and items\r\n used to strengthen Ricca.=<b>箱子</b>\r\n 站立在其前面时\r\n按攻击按钮打开它。\r\n 箱子含有魔法石和物品\r\n 用于加强Ricca。

=============

Collapsed Bridge Gorge=塌桥峡谷
Now use Sword Throw to get over that cliff.=如果我用魔法剑就可以越过那个悬崖。
Great, let's move forward.=嗯，我们快点出发吧。
Can I throw my sword here like earlier to get over this cliff?=用刚才学会的魔法剑能越过这个悬崖吗？
Yes, when you throw your magic sword, it can lodge into a vertical cliff and act as a foothold.=是的，你扔掉你的魔剑，可以创造立足点，哪怕是在角度接近垂直的悬崖上都能站稳。

Be careful with how much you use it, though. You can also throw it to attack faraway enemies, but it's not very powerful, and it consumes magic every time you use it.=飞剑也可以攻击到远处的敌人。但威力较小，每次使用都会消耗魔力，请注意。
Oh...? This feeling...=哦...？这个感觉...
Talk=讲话

Male Soldier=男士兵

Donny was injured a little, but he's safe. But the village was ravaged by monsters...=Donny受了一点伤，但他没事。但村庄被怪物蹂躏...

I do... I was on my way to your village with a message for Donny, but a horde of monsters came from the direction I was heading...=嗯...我正在前往村庄，因为Donny报了信，但是一个部落的怪物在前路涌现...
I knew I didn't stand a chance fighting against them alone, so I was hiding here until it was safe... Before I knew it, it was the dead of night.=我知道我没有机会独自对抗他们，所以我躲在这里，直到变得安全点...唉，恐怖的死亡一夜。
I see... Um... D-Did you see anyone captured by the monsters?=是啊...嗯... 你，你看到任何被怪物捕获的人了吗？

What a pathetic man. You're wasting your time talking to this human. Let's move on.=多么可怜的人。你正在浪费你的时间与这个人交谈。让我们继续前进。
Huh? I heard a voice coming from my body... Oh, it's Iris... Okay, we can go, but...=啊？我听到了我身体的声音...哦，是Iris...好吧，我们可以去，但是...

Could you go to my village? I defeated the monsters on my way here, so there shouldn't be any left...=你能去村里吗？我在路上击败了怪物，所以应该不会留下任何...
I think the village is safe now, but Donny was hurt, and there might be a few monsters around the village...=我认为这个村庄现在是安全的，但Donny受到了伤害，村里可能有几个怪物...
I want you to help the people there...!=我希望你帮助那里的人...！
Can you...do that for me...?=你能...为我这么...做吗？
Alright, I'll go to your village... I was on my way there to contact Donny, anyway. I might as well fulfill my duty...=好吧，我会去你的村庄...无论如何，我正在联系那里的Donny。我也可以履行我的职责...
Thank you so much... Please be careful!=非常感谢...请小心！
The plants here are withered, too? But slimes were the only monsters I saw in this area before...=这里的草木都枯萎了？明明以前的魔物只有史莱姆...
I sense a Drain Crystal ahead of us. Let's find it and destroy it.=前面感觉到黑暗水晶的邪恶波动。找到后摧毁它吧。

Be careful when you're close to walls or when you're in narrow places like between pillars. Sometimes your sword will get stuck.=当你靠近墙壁或柱子之间的狭窄地方时要小心。请注意剑会被卡住。
I think this weapon is too big for me. It's kinda hard to wield... I wish God had given me a smaller, cuter weapon...=这把剑对我来说很难驾驭...如果神把它变成更小更可爱的武器就好了...
That might be enough for defeating slimes and goblins, but you'll need a sword this large to fight against big, strong monsters like golems.=史莱姆或者哥布林那种程度还好说，如果是石像鬼那样强大、坚韧的魔物，这样大的剑是非常有必要的。

You want to make a wound you can use to transfer holy power into them with your blade. If you attack the inside of the body directly like that, you can destroy any monster.=从剑身灌注的神圣之力可以用斩击造成大量伤害。能直接攻击魔物的内部，消灭各种魔物。

Haa... Haa... I know... So what...?=哈哈...哈哈...我知道...所以...？
This magic item I gave you... The holy knight's brooch uses the wearer's magic to draw out holy power from the earth and sky.=这个魔导具...圣骑士的胸针使用佩戴者的魔力，从大地与空气中提取神圣的力量。
In other words, this brooch is the source of the holy power used to defeat demons. It's a very precious item, so handle it with care, okay?=换句话说，这个胸针是打倒魔物的神圣力量的来源。这是一个非常珍贵的东西，所以不能随意对待。
O-Okay... Huff... Haa... So... What then...?=嗯嗯...呼...哈...那个...然后...？
The brooch uses the magic within you to fuel holy knight powers. To put it another way, every time you wield the holy knight's power, it chips away at your own magic.=胸针将你自身的魔力作为燃料，将魔力转化为圣骑士的力量。反过来说，作为圣骑士每次施展力量，你都会消耗魔力。
When you run out of magic energy, you lose your holy knight abilities. I don't expect that you will exhaust your magic, as long as you don't use it recklessly or over a long period of time.=魔力耗尽的话就无法使用能力了。不过，不长时间使用的话，就不会消耗怎么多魔力吧
Okay... I see... Thanks...for telling me that...=好的...我明白了...谢谢你...告诉我...
You seem to have as much magic as any regular human... It's clear to me that you're running low on both magic and stamina from your unsteady feet.=你现在的魔力就和普通人差不多...现在看来只是魔力和体力都用尽了，才变得摇摇晃晃的样子。
That's why you should rest in your normal form and restore your magic.=还是这样休息一下吧，等魔力恢复为好。
But... I have to get to my sister...=但是...我必须快些找回我的姐姐...

I understand that you're worried, but if they're intending to rape her, she probably won't be killed. Besides...=我晓得你担心，但如果他们打算强奸她，她可能不会被杀。除此之外...

Let me finish! I think those goblins kidnapped your sister for a different purpose.=请听我把话说完！我认为那些哥布林把你姐姐抓走，另有目的。

Then why did they take away Miria...? My sister is... She's good at cooking and is a bit of a worrywart, but she's just a normal girl...=那他们为什么带走Miria ...？我姐姐是...只是个会做饭又爱操心的普通人啊...
Your sister's a real beauty, right? Maybe they're going to give her to Archlich as a gift...=你的姐姐很漂亮吧？难道是要作为礼物送给大尸巫吗...
Whatever the reason, you need to rest now so you have the energy to catch up to them and find out.=嗯，为了追上它们找到原因，现在就需要休息。
Okay... I'll rest a little...=好的...我会休息一下...
Good. You really need the break.=嗯，那我们休息一下吧。
Well then... Heehee... If that's settled, we'd better prepare.=那么... 呵呵...决定了的话，就准备下吧。
First, go collect some branches we can use for firewood. By the time you're done with that, you should have recovered some magic. Then transform again, beat a slime and hell beetle, and bring them over here.=先收集树枝作为篝火，之后魔力会稍微恢复。你就再一次变身，打倒史莱姆和地狱甲虫，把它们搬过来。
Oh, but don't use your sword. The holy powers will immediately turn the corpse into Magic Stones, so punch them and knock them out instead. Hehe... Once you're done with all that, you can go to sleep.=但不要用你的剑。神圣的力量立即会将尸体转变为魔法石，所以打晕它们就好了。呵呵...等结束了，再睡一会吧。

I see... So you lost both your parents... I'm sorry for bringing back sad memories.=我晓得...你失去了父母...忆及伤心处了，抱歉。
It's okay. I was little and I don't remember much about them, anyway. Besides, I've always had Miria around, so I wasn't lonely at all, and I had friends like Olivia and Polon to play with...=没关系。无论如何，我很小，我不记得他们。此外，我一直都在Miria身边，我根本不孤独，我有朋友Olivia，能和Polon玩...

What, flowers? Heehee, of course not. We're born from our mothers, just like humans.=什么，鲜花？嘿嘿，当然没有。我们从母亲分娩而生，像人类一样。
My parents and grandparents should be doing well in the neighboring village, but I've been so busy with serving God, I haven't had the chance to visit them lately.=我的父母和祖父母应该在邻近的村庄，干的一把好手，但我最近一直忙于服侍上帝，没有机会去拜访他们。
Oh... And I have a younger brother...=哦...我有一个弟弟...
Younger brother?=弟弟？
Yes, he's around the same age as you...=是的，他约与你同龄...

I suppose so...=我想是这样...

...It isn't. Anyway, that human soldier said something about a settlement in the forest. Do you think it's far from here?=...他不是。不说这个，人类士兵说了些关于森林的定居点。你觉得它距离这里远吗？
Huh...? Yeah, I think it'll take us about half a day to get there. Oh, but if I head there in my holy knight form, we might get there sooner. I can run much faster when I transform.=嗯...？是啊，我们大约半天能到达那里。但如果我开圣骑士模式，我可以跑得更快。
Hehe, then you could run even faster without armor. It seems like this area doesn't have strong monsters. It should be no problem if you're lightly dressed.=呵呵，那么你在没有铠甲的时候，跑得不是更快吗。似乎这个地区没有强壮的怪物。你轻装上阵，应该也没问题。
What? So you want me to take off the armor after I transform into a knight? But that armor's white and shiny. It must be expensive...=什么？所以你想让我在变圣骑士后脱掉盔甲？但那个盔甲那么白，那么闪亮。一定很值钱...
Teehee... No, you just have to transform into a holy knight without forming the armor.=嘿嘿 ...不，你只需要变身为一个没有形成盔甲的圣骑士。
When you transform with the brooch, imagine yourself only wearing the blue dress. You should be able to transform based on that mental image.=您应该能够基于心理图像进行变身。你用胸针变身，想象自己只穿着蓝色的裙裾。
Wow, I didn't know I could that! This brooch is amazing.=哇，我不知道，我可以！这个胸针好牛哇。
Huh...? If I can transform into whatever I imagine, does that mean I can change into other forms?=呵呵...？如果我可以变身为我想象的，这是否意味着我可以改为其他装饰？
Now you're getting it, heehee... If you can imagine it, you can change not just your clothes, but your face and body, even the color of your skin.=现在你已经得到了它，嘿嘿...如果你能想象，你就可以改变你的衣服，甚至是你的脸和身体、肤色。

Teehee... That must be your ideal form.=嗨哈...这一定是你理想的模样。
When you transform into a different outfit for the first time, you'll have to consume a lot of magic to make the outfit from scratch. Just like strengthening your abilities, you'll need to collect a lot of Magic Stones to do this.=当你第一次变身为不同的装饰时，必须消耗很多魔法来从头开始制作衣服。就像加强你的能力一样，你需要收集很多魔石来这么做。
The holy knight's armor and gauntlets provide great defense thanks to their divine protection, but they're a little heavy.=由于他们的神圣保护，圣骑士的盔甲和防护手套提供了很大的防御值，但它们是大型辎重。
When you're traveling a long distance or dealing with a fast monster, you might want to change into your lightweight form.=当您长途旅行或应对敏捷的怪物时，您可能希望改为轻量级装扮。

==========穷举数字信息===现在基本可以弄！==============


注意：现在基本文本都抓取完毕了，请修改
配置文件的
TemplateAllNumberAway=False改为True
使得数字表达式启用。
新获取到的文本中的任何数字都将被双层半角大括号中夹杂大写字母取代
已经写了定值数字的行不会受影响，不会重新抓到。

例子：（这个角度值会不停地变（几千个值），如果不这样做，文本会一直抽搐！！！）
Angle:{{A}} degrees=角度：{{A}} 度

----------------------------------------------------------------
Currently owned {{A}}=目前拥有 {{A}}
Weight : {{A}}kg=体重 : {{A}}kg
{{A}}回={{A}}次
所持数 {{A}} / {{B}}=所持数 {{A}} / {{B}}
{{A}} enemies={{A}} 敌人
{{A}}度回転={{A}}度旋转
BGM: No.{{A}}=BGM: {{A}}号
{{A}} seconds={{A}} 秒
Speed x {{A}}=速度 x {{A}}

A girl who lives in a mountain village. While her lifestyle may not be extravagant, she and her older sister, Miria, live together happily with the help of their fellow villagers. She usually either works as a clerk at her village's general store or gathers herbs in the mountains. She often argues with her older sister who still treats her like a child, but deep down she really loves her. \r\nTravelers often come in search of food or lodging from a large mountain road that runs near the village. The village youngsters tend to listen closely to the words of travelers and long for the world outside the village, but Ricca is generally uninterested and prefers to take things at her own pace.=A girl who lives in a mountain village. While her lifestyle may not be extravagant, she and her older sister, Miria, live together happily with the help of their fellow villagers. She usually either works as a clerk at her village's general store or gathers herbs in the mountains. She often argues with her older sister who still treats her like a child, but deep down she really loves her. \r\nTravelers often come in search of food or lodging from a large mountain road that runs near the village. The village youngsters tend to listen closely to the words of travelers and long for the world outside the village, but Ricca is generally uninterested and prefers to take things at her own pace.
The most beautiful girl in the village and Ricca's gentle older sister. She is 10 years older than Ricca and usually works in the cafeteria. After losing their parents to an epidemic, she did everything in her power to raise Ricca, who was still a child. She has since mellowed out, but she used to be very emotional, shy and had a very strong sense of duty. \r\nLegends of a fallen kingdom have been passed down by refugees for hundreds of years. A rundown church from that time still stands within the village. The church is still used to this day. Miria currently cleans and manages it in place of the elderly village mayor and his wife.=The most beautiful girl in the village and Ricca's gentle older sister. A rundown church from that time still stands within the village. The church is still used to this day. Miria currently cleans and manages it in place of the elderly village mayor and his wife.
The form taken by Ricca after transforming using the power of the brooch given to her by "God." \r\nThrough divine magical protection, Ricca's soft, light body now contains strength on par with a muscular adult male. Her endurance and recovery capabilities have also improved drastically. \r\nRicca's sun-shaped brooch is enchanted with a variety of spells. It enhances Ricca's abilities by absorbing magic, allowing her to fight against monsters on a more equal footing.=The form taken by Ricca after transforming using the power of the brooch given to her by "God." \r\nThrough divine magical protection, Ricca's soft, light body now contains strength on par with a muscular adult male. Her endurance and recovery capabilities have also improved drastically. \r\nRicca's sun-shaped brooch is enchanted with a variety of spells. It enhances Ricca's abilities by absorbing magic, allowing her to fight against monsters on a more equal footing.
The form taken by Ricca after fully drawing out the latent holy knight energy contained within her brooch by combining the magic of humans, monsters and darkness. Due to the tremendous magic expenditure of this form, it may be difficult for the newly-transformed Ricca to handle, but if she were to obtain complete control over it, her power could exceed even that of a god.=The form taken by Ricca after fully drawing out the latent holy knight energy contained within her brooch by combining the magic of humans, monsters and darkness. Due to the tremendous magic expenditure of this form, it may be difficult for the newly-transformed Ricca to handle, but if she were to obtain complete control over it, her power could exceed even that of a god.
A fairy who traveled from the high mountains in search of the one chosen to be the holy knight. A mystic who uses restorative and illusion magic to aid her allies in combat. \r\nBecause she was still relatively young amongst fairy kind, whose lifespans far exceed those of humans, it was believed she would be capable of adapting to the world of humans. Thus she was given the mission of providing support for the holy knight by "God". \r\nDespite being a kind girl who cares for her friends at heart, the importance of her mission weighs heavily on her shoulders, often causing her expression to grow stern.=A fairy who traveled from the high mountains in search of the one chosen to be the holy knight. Thus she was given the mission of providing support for the holy knight by "God". \r\nDespite being a kind girl who cares for her friends at heart, the importance of her mission weighs heavily on her shoulders, often causing her expression to grow stern.
A mage girl who saved Ricca when she was being attacked by orcs. Polite and diligent. In order to focus on her magic research she currently lives in isolation, away from villages and towns. She feels lonely because she doesn't have any friends. Her parents are both renowned mages - her father specializing in restorative magic and her mother in attack magic. Claret herself received special education from a young age and is able to use a wide variety of magic. Her parents were summoned to the capital in an effort to deal with the monster problem, so Claret currently lives alone, protecting her isolated home while eliminating nearby monsters.=A mage girl who saved Ricca when she was being attacked by orcs. Polite and diligent. In order to focus on her magic research she currently lives in isolation, away from villages and towns. She feels lonely because she doesn't have any friends. Her parents are both renowned mages - her father specializing in restorative magic and her mother in attack magic. Claret herself received special education from a young age and is able to use a wide variety of magic. Her parents were summoned to the capital in an effort to deal with the monster problem, so Claret currently lives alone, protecting her isolated home while eliminating nearby monsters.

A female Demon who feeds on the semen of humans and demi-humans. In order to capture the holy knight girl, Miria's body was modified by Archlich's spells. She's been given a lightning attack that can pierce through holy protection as well as a magic eye that can seduce its target regardless of gender. Miria's sense of right and wrong have been overwritten to suit her monstrous form. A half-beast, half-Demon who possesses both a limitless supply of magic and an intellect high enough to understand human language. The beast that appeared in front of Ricca's party was one that had made a connection with a mage girl 60 years ago. From that experience, it began to hunt monsters and soon came to be worshipped as a guardian by humans in the surrounding lands. After its mind was polluted by evil energy, it began to shut itself away in its lair. It now protects the drain crystal that absorbs the overflowing earth magic from in the valley.=A half-beast, half-Demon who possesses both a limitless supply of magic and an intellect high enough to understand human language. However, to protect the northern lands for its comrades, it willingly became a subordinate of the Archlich. \r\nPossesses a large, powerful body which has adapted to better maintain its body heat in harsh environments. A ghoul created by a lich by pouring his evil magic into the corpse of an orc. With empowered endurance and regenerative abilities, any damage taken from a half-hearted attack will be instantly restored. Because its body size and weight have increased, each step it takes causes small tremors in its vicinity. It wields a war hammer infused with lightning magic, but unlike the succubus', this magic doesn't have any special properties.=A ghoul created by a lich by pouring his evil magic into the corpse of an orc. With empowered endurance and regenerative abilities, any damage taken from a half-hearted attack will be instantly restored. Because its body size and weight have increased, each step it takes causes small tremors in its vicinity. It wields a war hammer infused with lightning magic, but unlike the succubus', this magic doesn't have any special properties.
